○000001○Matsushita
●000001●松下

○000002○"One hundred two! One hundred three! One hundred four!"
●000002●「一百零二！一百零三！一百零四！」

○000003○Matsushita
●000003●松下

○000004○"One hundred two! One hundred three! One hundred four!"
●000004●「一百零二！一百零三！一百零四！」

○000005○I watched Matsushita Godan practicing his judo techniques from the shadows of the nearby trees.
●000005●站在阴影之中的我，注视着不断练习柔道的松下五段。

○000006○His regrets probably have something to do with judo as well, I'd imagine...
●000006●果然，他生前的遗憾应该也和柔道有关吧…。

○000007○Thanks to his diet he looked ready to graduate at any moment, physically speaking, so whatever's weighing on him must be more psychological than physiological.
●000007●他的减肥已经成功了，肉体看起来随时都可以毕业，但心里肯定还有什么沉重的东西吧。

○000008○Matsushita
●000008●松下

○000009○"One hundred ninety eight! One hundred ninety nine! Two hundred!"
●000009●「一百九十八！一百九十九！二百！」

○000010○Matsushita
●000010●松下

○000011○"Phew..."
●000011●「呼…」

○000012○Matsushita
●000012●松下

○000013○"One hundred ninety eight! One hundred ninety nine! Two hundred!"
●000013●「一百九十八！一百九十九！二百！」

○000014○Matsushita
●000014●松下

○000015○"Haaaah..."
●000015●「哈…」

○000016○Matsushita was taking a break. That was my cue to make an appearance.
●000016●松下开始休息了。到我出现的机会了。

○000759○nothing
●000759●nothing

○000760○nothing
●000760●nothing

○000761○The goal of two-player mahjong is, in short, to chip away at your opponent's points. It's a sudden-death variant of the game where if you lose all your points, you lose the game.
●000761●双人麻将，说的简单些，就是要让对方的点数减少。因此，采用的是点数减到0以下即视为失败的突然死亡规则。

○001179○nothing

○001180○The goal of two-player mahjong is, in short, to chip away at your opponent's points. It's a sudden-death variant of the game where if you lose all your points, you lose the game.
●001180●双人麻将，说的简单些，就是要让对方的点数减少。因此，采用的是点数减到0以下即视为失败的突然死亡规则。

○003903○I tried to imagine it.

○003904○Being blind... so, not being able to see anything, not even light.
●003904●眼睛看不见，就是什么都看不见，连光都没有。

○003905○In other words, constant darkness.
●003905●也就是说，是黑暗。

○003906○And not just any darkness. Absolute, perpetual darkness.
●003906●而且，并不只是黑暗。一直，永远都是黑暗。

○003907○With no hope of any light at the end of the tunnel.
●003907●永远不会有光明的黑暗。

○003908○Much as I didn't want to think about it, the thought took me back to the tunnel I'd been trapped in.
●003908●就算我很不愿去回忆，还是想起了那场隧道里的事故。

○003909○I had a tiny bit of light from my phone and the emergency lights, so it wasn't absolute darkness, but I'd spent days on end with only those dimmest of lights available.
●003909●因为有手机和应急灯的一点光芒，并不是完全的黑暗，但还是持续了几天的，只有微弱的光芒的黑暗。

○003910○Not knowing when or if rescue would arrive, and dreading whatever the future might bring...
●003910●而且还有不知道救援什么时候才会来的，看不到未来的恐惧…。

●003911●很可怕

●003912●已经习惯了

○004564○"...How?"

○004565○I wasn't sure if it was okay for me to ask that, but I ended up going for it.
●004565●虽然犹豫着要不要问，但还是问了出来。

○004566○Matsushita
●004566●松下

○004567○"To a sickness. I ran a high fever for over a week, and was on the brink between life and death."
●004567●「因为疾病。持续高烧了一个星期，在鬼门关上徘徊着」

○004568○Matsushita
●004568●松下

○004569○By the time the fever finally went down, I'd lost my vision.
●004569●「等到烧终于退下来的时候，眼睛已经看不见了」

○004570○He sounded quite calm as he described it.
●004570●他的语气相当平静。

○004571○Matsushita
●004571●松下

○004572○"The morning I woke up after my fever finally broke, it was a pretty nasty shock..."
●004572●「高烧治好之后，醒来的那个早晨，真的是相当震惊…」

○004573○Matsushita
●004573●松下

○004574○"The world that'd carried on without a hitch up 'till then, the world I'd taken for granted, felt like it'd changed completely."
●004574●「在那之前什么都没有发生过的，觉得理所当然的世界，完全地改变了」

○004575○Matsushita
●004575●松下

○004576○"Just like you said, at first, the darkness scared me."
●004576●「就像你说的那样，最初的黑暗很恐怖」

○004577○Matsushita
●004577●松下

○004578○"The places I'd known so well before―my house, my school―were suddenly completely unknown to me."
●004578●「在此之前相当熟悉的地方，自己的家和学校，变成了完全陌生的地方」

○004579○Matsushita
●004579●松下

○004580○"Even though we're always looking at the world, when it comes down to it we actually see surprisingly little."
●004580●「就算我们一直在看着世界，但归结起来，所看到的还是相当之少」

○004581○Matsushita
●004581●松下

○004582○"When you lose your vision, you suddenly lose all awareness of where everything you used to know is."
●004582●「到底哪里有什么，一旦眼睛看不见之后，立刻就不知道了」

○004583○Matsushita
●004583●松下

○004584○"Your field of vision's constantly pitch black, and every step you take makes you worry that you'll trip over something."
●004584●「视野里纯粹是一片黑暗，每走上一步，都担心会不会被什么东西绊倒」

○004585○Matsushita
●004585●松下

○004586○"You very literally don't know right from left."
●004586●「正如常说的，从左到右什么都不知道」

○004587○Matsushita
●004587●松下

○004588○"The sounds you hear may come through too clearly for comfort, but you still can't tell who or what's actually making them."
●004588●「只有声音听的特别清楚，但却不知道是谁或是什么东西发出的声音」

○004589○Matsushita
●004589●松下

○004590○"You can't see the faces of your friends or family, you can't read, you can't study, and you can't even play in the playground."
●004590●「看不到父母和朋友的脸，也不能读书，也不能学习，也不能在操场上玩」

○004591○Matsushita
●004591●松下

○004592○"...Anyhow, I was just plain worried and terrified."
●004592●「…总之很不安，很害怕」

○004593○Matsushita
●004593●松下

○004594○"I spent a good long while shut up in my room. I didn't even go to school, y'know?"
●004594●「很长一段时间内，我都把自己关在房间里，连学校都没有去哦」

○004595○From the sound of things, Matsushita Godan was only about ten years old or so when he lost his vision. Just how frightening must that have been, for a child of that age?
●004595●松下五段丧失视力的时候，应该只有十岁左右，对于一个孩子的内心而言，一定相当的恐怖吧。

○004596○The dread brought on when the life you knew comes crumbling down in a single day...
●004596●直到昨天为止的生活，突然就尽数崩坏的恐怖。

●004623●也许是因为我没有接话吧，他大声地说着。

●004624●松下

●004625●「过了几个月之后，已经感觉挺平常了哦？」

●004626●松下

●004627●「父母和老师，朋友」

○004628○Matsushita
●004628●松下

○004629○...And all sorts of other people, too; everyone helped me out. Thanks to them, I managed to graduate from elementary school."
●004629●「…还有许多的其他人，在他们的帮助下，我顺利地从小学毕业了」

○004630○Matsushita
●004630●松下

○004631○"Even if you lose your vision you learn to get by without it in your own way, one way or another."
●004631●「失明了之后，就算看不见，终归也能够过下去的」

○004632○Matsushita
●004632●松下

●004633●「人啊，有志者事竟成哦」

○004657○"So then... just what were you afraid of?"

○004658○That was the question this whole story had spun out from, after all.
●004658●听松下五段一路讲下来之后，最先提出的便是这个问题。

○004659○It must be something really difficult to talk about. Matsushita Godan shut his mouth and stared out into the distance.
●004659●也许是因为很难开口吧，松下五段紧闭着嘴，将视线投向了遥远的方向。

○004660○つぐ
●004660●

○004661○噤
●004661●

○004662○んでから、視線を明後日の方向に向ける。
●004662●

○004663○Matsushita
●004663●松下

○004664○"Back when I could still see, I was a real sporty kid."
●004664●「在我还能看见的时候，我是个运动系的少年」

○004665○When he started talking again, it was almost like he was taking a detail around the question, dodging away from the main point.
●004665●重新开口说话的他，就好像是在绕远路一样，回避着话题的核心。

○004666○There was nothing to do but keep listening to him, for the moment.
●004666●现在能做的只有继续听松下五段说了。

○004667○Matsushita
●004667●松下

○004668○"I was pretty big back then, just like now, and athletic to boot."
●004668●「我那时的身体，已经和现在一样很大了，运动神经也很好」

○004669○Matsushita
●004669●松下

○004670○"I didn't play any one sport in particular. I kinda just mixed in with everyone else when they played soccer, or basketball, or whatever."
●004670●「并没有专门进行过什么特定的运动，只是和大家一起打打篮球或是踢踢足球而已」

○004671○Matsushita
●004671●松下

○004672○ "After I lost my vision, I couldn't get in the mood for that sort of thing for a while."
●004672●「我在失明之后的一段时间里，提不起去做这些事情的兴趣」

○004673○Matsushita
●004673●松下

○004674○"But as my lifestyle calmed down and I found a sorta stability, I started getting the urge to move around again like I used to."
●004674●「然而，在生活逐渐安定了下来之后，我又想和以前一样活动身体了」

○004675○Matsushita
●004675●松下

○004676○"That was when a certain person introduced me to judo."
●004676●「就在那时，有人向我介绍了…柔道」

○004677○That person must be the part that he's so embarrassed to talk about, I'd bet.
●004677●正是因为那个人，松下五段才会感到害羞吧。

○004678○I found it more than a bit suspicious, but I decided to keep listening for the moment.
●004678●感觉还是有些可疑，但先听他继续往下说吧。

○004679○Matsushita
●004679●松下

○004680○"I mean, of course I'd seen judo on TV and whatnot before then."
●004680●「当然，我在那之前只在电视上看到过柔道」

○004681○Matsushita
●004681●松下

○004682○"But, I'd never even considered taking it up myself."
●004682●「但是，从没想过自己去打」

○004683○Matsushita
●004683●松下

○004684○"There are special schools for the blind... well, they're technically called special needs schools, but since everyone around me called them that I ended up learning to as well."
●004684●「盲校…虽然本来是叫特殊教育学校，但是周围的大人们都这么叫，于是我就模仿他们了哦？」

○004710○Matsushita
●004710●松下

○004711○"I stayed in the same elementary school up 'till my graduation, but I planned on going there starting in junior high."
●004711●「我的小学是在之前的学校上完的，但我打算从初中开始前往那里」

○004712○Matsushita
●004712●松下

○004713○"Their facilities and educational system are totally different, after all."
●004713●「毕竟从设施到教学内容都完全不一样」

○004714○Matsushita
●004714●松下

○004715○"I'd already grown pretty big towards the end of elementary school, so I ended up taking judo lessons at that special school before I entered junior high."
●004715●「我的身体在小学高年级的时候就已经长得很大了，所以在初中之前，就在那里学习起了柔道」

○004716○Matsushita
●004716●松下

○004717○"I had no clue at the time, but as it turned out judo was the most prominent sport for visually impaired people."
●004717●「当时的我完全不知道，但柔道是视觉障碍者最主要的运动」

○004718○Matsushita
●004718●松下

○004719○"Thanks to that the club was quite active, with a buncha members and a highly experienced instructor."
●004719●「所以，社团相当活跃，部员相当的多，指导员的经验也相当丰富」

○004720○Matsushita
●004720●松下

○004721○"But still, at the start, I didn't know what I was doing at all."
●004721●「尽管如此，一开始也还是很不知所措」

○004722○Matsushita
●004722●松下

○004723○"After all, like I said earlier, I only had a vague sense for what judo was, at best."
●004723●「刚才也说过了，我对柔道知识的了解，仅仅是相当模糊的程度」

○004724○Matsushita
●004724●松下

○004725○"In judo for the visually impaired, matches start with you already grappling with your opponent."
●004725●「视觉障碍者的柔道比赛，是从已经和对手扭打住的状态开始的」

○004726○Matsushita
●004726●松下

○004727○"So, it's much easier to pull off techniques."

○004728○Matsushita
●004728●松下

○004729○"I had my very first match against an opponent who was way smaller than me, but they threw me like it was nothing."
●004729●「第一场比赛的时候，我被比自己小很多的对手轻松地扔飞了」

○004730○Matsushita
●004730●松下

○004731○"Part of me was surprised, part of me was frustrated..."
●004731●「吃惊的同时，也很沮丧…」

○004732○Matsushita
●004732●松下

○004733○"It was a 'what the hell!' sorta feeling, anyway."
●004733●「总之就是『真他妈见鬼！』的感觉」

○004734○Matsushita
●004734●松下

○004735○"I was always a sore loser, see."
●004735●「因为我并不服输」

○004736○...That determination of his probably played a part in his ability to overcome his blindness.
●004736●…也许这种毅力，也是使他克服失明这一障碍的因素之一吧。

○004740○Matsushita
●004740●松下

○004742○Matsushita

●004744●松下

○005387○Matsushita
●005387●松下

○005388○"...In retrospect, I figure that was her way of learning people's faces."
●005388●「…但之后再想的话，阳菜子就是通过这种方式，来记住别人的脸的吧」

○005389○Matsushita
●005389●松下

○005390○"Their eyes, their noses, their ears, their mouths, their hair... she seemed to enjoy the feel of all of them."
●005390●「眼睛，鼻子，耳朵，嘴巴，头发，她好像很享受所有这些的触感」

○005391○Matsushita
●005391●松下

○005392○"My cheeks were pretty soft, so she touched them particularly carefully."
●005392●「虽然以现在的我很难想象，但我当时的脸蛋相当柔嫩，所以她特别细心地触摸着」

○005393○Matsushita
●005393●松下

○005394○"Since the world was always blurry for her, touching someone was the best way to get to know them."
●005394●「对于眼前的世界总是一片模糊的她来说，触摸是最好的，了解对方的方式」

○005395○Matsushita
●005395●松下

○005396○"It was one thing when I was little, but even after I'd grown up a bit, I couldn't understand that."
●005396●「但是，小时候的我暂且不提，就算在我长大了一些之后，也还是没能明白」

●005398●nothing

●005406●松下

●005410●松下

○005412○Matsushita
●005412●松下

○005413○"Our mothers got along well, and I figure my mother worried about her niece. She took me out to play with them all the time."
●005413●「我们的母亲之间关系很好，妈妈一定也很担心侄女吧，经常带我们一起出去玩」

○005414○Matsushita
●005414●松下

○005415○"And every time, she'd touch my face, and I'd get upset..."
●005415●「每一次，她都会摸我的脸，感觉很讨厌…」

○005416○Matsushita
●005416●松下

○005417○"...I actually told her I hated it once, right to her face."
●005417●「…实际上，我有一次当着阳菜子桑的面，对她说了讨厌」

○005418○Godan bit his lip.
●005418●五段咬紧了嘴唇。

○005419○Matsushita
●005419●松下

○005556○"Yeah, I know that much, at least."
●005556●「嘛，这我还是知道的」

○005557○I was a bit bewildered by the question for a moment, since of course I knew that white canes existed, but then I put two and two together.
●005557●突然听到『baizhang』这个发音，让人很疑惑，但我觉得应该是『白杖』。

○005558○He was talking about the canes that blind people use to walk around safely.
●005558●视觉障碍者在行走时，所使用的拐杖。

○005559○Matsushita
●005559●松下

○005560○"I was already in elementary school at the time, so she must've been in high school."
●005560●「我那时候已经是小学生了，所以她应该是高中生吧」

○005561○Matsushita
●005561●松下

○005562○"I was walking around town with Hinako-san."
●005562●「我和阳菜子桑，一起在街上走着」

○005563○Matsushita
●005563●松下

○005564○"And then we happened to bump into some of my classmates."
●005564●「然后，突然就遇到了同学」

○005565○Matsushita
●005565●松下

○005566○"Kids are cruel, you know? Hinako-san and her white cane must've been a rarity in their minds."
●005566●「孩子可是很残忍的。拄着白杖的阳菜子桑，很稀奇的吧」

○005567○Matsushita
●005567●松下

○005568○"One of them knew that it was the sort of cane blind people carry."
●005568●「其中的一个人，知道那是眼睛看不见的人所用的东西」

○005569○Matsushita
●005569●松下

○005570○"My classmates started teasing her."
●005570●「同学们开始嘲笑起了她」

○005571○Matsushita
●005571●松下

○005572○"...I didn't say a word to stop them. I just kept quiet."
●005572●「…我并没有驳斥，只是一直沉默着」

○005573○Matsushita
●005573●松下

○005574○"And then I left Hinako-san on her own, and went off to play with them."
●005574●「然后，我把阳菜子桑放在一边，和他们一起去玩了」

○005575○Matsushita
●005575●松下

○005576○"I stayed out 'till the evening, and when I got back to my aunt's house, Hinako-san had already arrived home."
●005576●「一直玩到了黄昏，回到叔母家之后，阳菜子桑已经先回来了」

○005577○Matsushita
●005577●松下

○005578○"My mother really let me have it."
●005578●「被母亲狠狠地训了一顿」

○005579○Matsushita
●005579●松下

○005580○"But Hinako-san tried to cover for me."
●005580●「但是，阳菜子桑却在护着我」

○005581○Hinako
●005581●阳菜子

○005582○"You just wanted to play with your friends, right? I'm sorry."
●005582●「你只是想和朋友一起玩吧。抱歉呢」

○005583○Hinako
●005583●阳菜子

○005584○"I'm totally fine on my own, it's okay."
●005584●「我的话，一个人也完全没关系的」

○005585○Hinako
●005585●阳菜子

○005586○"I'm tough, after all!"
●005586●「毕竟，我很坚强！」

○005587○nothing
●005587●nothing

○005588○nothing
●005588●nothing

○005589○nothing
●005589●nothing

○005590○nothing
●005590●nothing

○005591○nothing
●005591●nothing

○005592○Matsushita
●005592●松下

○005593○"...She said."
●005593●「…她这么说」

○005594○Matsushita
●005594●松下

○005595○"It was true. Just like she said, Hinako-san was tough enough you'd never think her vision was bad if you didn't already know it."
●005595●「确实，她说的没错，阳菜子桑是个相当坚强的人，别人几乎不会觉得她视力很差」

○005596○Matsushita
●005596●松下

○005597○"...Looking back on it, she really spoiled me."
●005597●「…现在想想，她真的非常娇惯我」

○005598○And after that, Godan lost his own vision to his illness.
●005598●在那之后，护騨因为疾病而失去了视力。

○005599○Matsushita
●005599●松下

○005600○"I don't remember much about the nightmares I had during the week of my fever."
●005600●「我对高烧时噩梦般的那个星期，几乎没有什么记忆」

○005601○Matsushita
●005601●松下

○005602○"I never felt like I woke up during that time, either. By the time I came to my senses, I'd lost my vision."
●005602●「并没有过醒着的感觉。等到恢复知觉的时候，眼睛已经失去了光明」

○005603○Matsushita
●005603●松下

○005604○"I didn't understand what had happened..."
●005604●「不知道发生了什么…」

○005605○Matsushita
●005605●松下

○005606○"In my mind, it felt like I'd jumped from having my vision to lacking it in an instant. I couldn't help it."
●005606●「我的感觉，只是时间从看得见的时候，突然飞跃到了看不见的时候一样」

○005607○I tried to imagine how it had felt.
●005607●我想象了一下。

○005608○To open your eyes, but still see nothing.
●005608●明明睁开了眼睛，却什么也看不见。

○005609○A pitch-black world.
●005609●漆黑的世界。

○005610○Still able to hear, and still able to feel, if you reach out a hand.
●005610●还能够听到声音，伸出手的话，还能够有触感。

○005611○If you were in your own room, you might be able to identify your own bed or pillow.
●005611●如果在自己的房间里，也许能够分辨出枕头和被子。

○005612○In that sense, it wouldn't be any different from waking up normally.
●005612●睡觉和起床，不会有什么变化。

○005613○However, even with your eyes wide open, you couldn't see anything.
●005613●但是，即使睁大眼睛，也什么都看不见。

○005614○Matsushita
●005614●松下

○005615○"The first thing I did was touch my own face."
●005615●「我首先用手摸了摸自己的脸」

○005616○Matsushita
●005616●松下

○005617○"After I checked and found my eyes, my nose, my mouth and my ears still where they should be, I was a bit relieved."
●005617●「确认了眼睛，鼻子，嘴巴，耳朵都还在之后，稍微松了一口气」

○005618○Matsushita
●005618●松下

○005619○"I knew that I was still myself."
●005619●「知道了自己还是那个自己」

○005620○Matsushita
●005620●松下

○005621○"I'd been hospitalized, so I woke up in a bed."
●005621●「我住了院。醒来的时候在床上」

○005622○Matsushita
●005622●松下

○005623○"I'd been unconscious with a high fever for a week, so it was only natural."
●005623●「因为高烧而连续七天处于无意识状态，所以这是理所当然的」

○005624○Matsushita
●005624●松下

○005625○"I was examined, and I learned that not only had I truly lost my eyesight, but also that it'd almost certainly never return."
●005625●「在接受了检查之后得知，不仅失去了视力，而且再也无法恢复了」

○005626○...Godan's explanation was impassive.
●005626●…护騨说的很轻快。

○005627○Matsushita
●005627●松下

○005628○"Hinako-san came to visit me in the hospital immediately."
●005628●「阳菜子桑立刻就来看望我了」

○005629○Hinako
●005629●阳菜子

○005630○"Dan-chan, it's okay. I'm here for you."
●005630●「騨酱，没关系。有我在呢」

○005631○nothing
●005631●nothing

○005632○nothing
●005632●nothing

○005633○nothing
●005633●nothing

○005634○nothing
●005634●nothing

○005635○nothing
●005635●nothing

○005636○Matsushita
●005636●松下

○005637○消去
●005637●消去

○005638○Matsushita
●005638●松下

○005639○"Hinako-san said that for my sake."
●005639●「阳菜子桑这么对我说」

○005640○Matsushita
●005640●松下

○005641○"She was certainly my senpai when it came to living with a disability, and in that sense her presence should've been reassuring."
●005641●「确实，作为残疾方面的前辈，她的存在使人相当安心」

○005642○Matsushita
●005642●松下

○005643○"But at the time, I didn't have the composure to think like that."
●005643●「然而，那时的我，根本没有去想这种事情的余裕」

○005644○Matsushita
●005644●松下

○005645○"I was forced to remember what I'd done on that day."
●005645●「我想起的是那天的事情」

○005646○Matsushita
●005646●松下

○005647○"I'd abandoned Hinako-san and gone off to play with my friends."
●005647●「我抛弃了阳菜子桑，去和朋友们一起玩了」

○005648○Matsushita
●005648●松下

○005649○"So, wasn't it my turn to be abandoned myself, this time?"
●005649●「那么，这次该轮到我被抛弃了吧？」

○005650○Matsushita
●005650●松下

○005651○"Soccer, basketball―I couldn't play the games I'd enjoyed before."
●005651●「喜欢的足球和篮球，已经无法再玩了」

○005652○Matsushita
●005652●松下

○005653○"And above all else, the darkness terrified me."
●005653●「在这之上，最可怕的是黑暗」

○005654○Matsushita
●005654●松下

○005655○"I couldn't see any of the things I'd known before."
●005655●「至今为止看过的东西，全都看不到了」

○005656○Matsushita
●005656●松下

○005657○"The day-to-day inconvenience wasn't the only problem."
●005657●「不仅仅是日常生活变得不方便」

○005658○Matsushita
●005658●松下

○005659○"I couldn't see people's expressions."
●005659●「看不到人的表情」

○005660○Matsushita
●005660●松下

○005661○"To put it another way, that means I couldn't get what other people were thinking."
●005661●「换句话说，无法知道别人在想什么」

○005662○Matsushita
●005662●松下

○005663○"My classmates came to visit me, too."
●005663●「同学们也来看望我了」

○005664○Matsushita
●005664●松下

○005665○"They said all sorts of kind things to me."
●005665●「他们说了些安慰的话」

○005666○Matsushita
●005666●松下

○005667○"But, could it be they were really sneering at me? Was it my turn to be made fun of like that?"
●005667●「但也许，脸上其实是在嘲笑吧？轮到我被嘲弄了吧？」

○005668○Matsushita
●005668●松下

○005669○"If all you have to worry about is your words, you can say whatever you want to..."
●005669●「如果只是言语的话，说什么都可以…」

○005670○Matsushita
●005670●松下

○005671○"...Looking back on it, I was a pretty awful kid."
●005671●「…现在回想起来，我真是个糟糕的孩子啊」

○005672○Matsushita
●005672●松下

○005673○"But at the time, that's really what I thought."
●005673●「但是，那时的我真的是这么想的」

○005674○Matsushita
●005674●松下

○005675○ "Even after I was discharged I couldn't work up the nerve to go through the rehab I needed to get back to my daily life, and instead I shut myself up in my room."
●005675●「即使出院之后，我也没有心情去进行恢复日常生活所需的康复治疗，而是把自己关在了房间里」

○005676○Matsushita
●005676●松下

○005677○"My parents acted like I was some sorta boil that would burst if they touched it, and left me alone."
●005677●「父母把我当作是烫手山芋一样，一直没吭声」

○005678○Matsushita
●005678●松下

○005679○"About a month later, Hinako-san came to visit me again."
●005679●「过了一个月左右，阳菜子桑又来拜访我了」

○005680○Matsushita
●005680●松下

○005681○"...'Dan-chan', she said."
●005681●「…『騨酱』，她说」

○005682○She walked into my room, went straight over to the corner I was huddled in and threw her arms around me.
●005682●她走进了房间里，紧紧地抱住了坐在房间角落里的我。

○005683○In the past I'd have likely struggled, but that time, I just passively let it happen.
●005683●如果是以前的话，我会感到讨厌，但那时的我，只是任其发展下去。

○005684○Matsushita
●005684●松下

○005685○"She didn't say a word. She just held me there, tightly."
●005685●「她什么都没说，只是一直抱着我」

○005686○Matsushita
●005686●松下

○005687○"I didn't say a word, either."
●005687●「我也，什么都没说」

○005688○Matsushita
●005688●松下

○005689○"I just stayed there, perfectly still within her embrace."
●005689●「我，只是默默地，依偎在她的怀里」

○005690○Matsushita
●005690●松下

○005691○"I'm surprised you don't know, considering you were aiming to be a doctor."
●005691●「身为以医生为目标的人，却连这都不知道啊」

○005692○Matsushita
●005692●松下

○005693○"It's called judo for the visually impaired. You've probably at least heard of the Paralympics, right?"
●005693●「有种东西叫做视觉障碍者柔道。听说过残奥会这个词吧」

●005756●「我是在孩童时期失去的视觉。那时是小学三年级」

○005779○"...How?"
●005779●「…为什么？」

○005780○I wasn't sure if it was okay for me to ask that, but I ended up going for it.
●005780●虽然犹豫着要不要问，但还是问了出来。

○005781○Matsushita
●005781●松下

○005782○"To a sickness. I ran a high fever for over a week, and was on the brink between life and death."
●005782●「因为疾病。持续高烧了一个星期，在鬼门关上徘徊」

○005783○Matsushita
●005783●松下

○005784○"By the time the fever finally faded, I had lost my vision."
●005784●「等到烧终于退下来的时候，眼睛已经看不见了」

○005785○He sounded quite calm as he described it.
●005785●他的语气相当平静。

○005786○Matsushita
●005786●松下

○005787○"The morning I woke up after my fever finally broke, it was quite the shock..."
●005787●「高烧治好之后，醒来的早晨，真的是相当震惊…」

○005788○Matsushita
●005788●松下

○005789○"The world that up until then had carried on without a hitch, the world I'd taken for granted, felt like it had changed completely."
●005789●「在那之前什么都没有发生过的，觉得理所当然的世界，完全地改变了」

○005790○Matsushita
●005790●松下

○005791○"Just as you said, at first, the darkness scared me."
●005791●「就像你说的那样，最初的黑暗很恐怖」

○005792○Matsushita
●005792●松下

○005793○"The places I'd known so well before―my house, my school― were suddenly completely unfamiliar to me."
●005793●「此前相当熟悉的地方，自己的家和学校，变成了完全陌生的地方」

○005794○Matsushita
●005794●松下

○005795○"Even though we're always looking at the world, when it comes down to it we actually see surprisingly little."
●005795●「就算我们一直看着世界，但归结起来，所看到的还是相当之少」

○005796○Matsushita
●005796●松下

○005797○"When you lose your vision, you suddenly lose all awareness of where everything you used to know is."
●005797●「到底哪里有什么，一旦眼睛看不见了之后，立刻就不知道了」

○005798○Matsushita
●005798●松下

○005799○"Your field of vision's constantly pitch black, and every step you take makes you worry that you'll trip over something."
●005799●「视野里纯粹是一片黑暗，每走一步，都担心会不会被什么东西绊倒」

○005800○Matsushita
●005800●松下

○005801○"You very literally don't know right from left."
●005801●「正如俗话说的，从左到右什么都不知道」

○005802○Matsushita
●005802●松下

○005803○"The sounds you hear may come through all too clearly, but in spite of that you can't tell who or what might be making them."
●005803●「只有声音听的特别清楚，但却不知道是谁，或是什么东西发出的声音」

○005804○Matsushita
●005804●松下

○005805○"You can't see the faces of your friends or family, you can't read, you can't study, and you can't even play in the playground."
●005805●「看不见父母和朋友的脸，也不能读书，也不能学习，也不能在操场上玩」

○005806○Matsushita
●005806●松下

○005807○"...In any case, I was full of worries and fear."
●005807●「…总之很不安，很害怕」

○005808○Matsushita
●005808●松下

○005809○"I spent a fair bit of time shut up in my room, not even going to school."
●005809●「很长一段时间内，我都把自己关在房间里，连学校都没有去」

○005810○From the sound of things, Matsushita Godan was only about ten years old or so when he lost his vision. Just how frightening must that have been, for a child of that age?
●005810●松下五段丧失视力的时候，应该只有十岁左右，对于一个孩子的内心而言，一定相当的恐怖吧。

○005811○The dread brought on when the life you knew comes crumbling down in a single day...
●005811●直到昨天为止的生活，突然就尽数崩坏的恐怖。

●005846●「失明之后，就算看不见，终归也能够过下去的」

○005847○Matsushita
●005847●松下

●005848●「人啊，有志者事竟成」

○005872○"So then... just what were you afraid of?"
●005872●「那么…你到底，害怕着什么？」

○005873○That was the question this whole story had spun out from, after all.
●005873●听松下五段一路讲下来之后，最先提出的便是这个问题。

○005874○Matsushita
●005874●松下

○005875○"Hold on, I'll get there. Let me go through it in order."
●005875●「嘛，等一下。按顺序说」

○005876○Could it be he's deliberately dancing around the heart of the matter?
●005876●该不会是在回避事情的核心吧。

○005877○It really must be something that's hard to talk about.
●005877●看来，是很难说出口的事情。

○005878○I continued harboring doubts, but there was nothing to do but keep listening to him for the moment.
●005878●虽然我怀有疑问，但现在只能听松下五段说下去了。

○005879○Matsushita
●005879●松下

○005880○"Back when I could still see, I was a really sporty kid."
●005880●「我在还能看见的时候，是个运动系的少年」

○005881○Matsushita
●005881●松下

○005882○"I was pretty big back then, just like I am now, and athletic to boot."
●005882●「我那时的身体，已经和现在一样很大了，运动神经也很好」

○005883○Matsushita
●005883●松下

○005884○"I didn't play any one sport in particular. I just mixed in with everyone else when they played soccer, or basketball, or whatever."
●005884●「并没有专门进行什么特定的运动，只是和大家一起打打篮球或是踢踢足球而已」

○005885○Matsushita
●005885●松下

○005886○"After I lost my vision, I couldn't get in the mood for that sort of thing for some time."
●005886●「我在失明后的一段时间里，提不起去做这些事情的兴趣」

○005887○Matsushita
●005887●松下

○005888○"But as my lifestyle calmed down and I found a certain stability, I started feeling the urge to move around again like I used to."
●005888●「然而，在生活逐渐安定下来之后，我又想和以前一样活动身体了」

○005889○Matsushita
●005889●松下

○005890○"That was when a certain person introduced me to judo."
●005890●「就在那时，有个人向我介绍了…柔道」

○005951○Matsushita
●005951●松下

○005952○"I stayed in the same elementary school up until my graduation, but I planned on going there starting in junior high school."
●005952●「我的小学是在之前的学校上完的，但我打算从初中开始前往那里」

○005953○Matsushita
●005953●松下

○005954○"Their facilities and educational system are totally different, after all."
●005954●「毕竟从设施到教学内容都完全不一样」

○005955○Matsushita
●005955●松下

○005956○"I'd already grown quite large towards the end of elementary school, so I ended up attending judo lessons at that special school before I entered junior high."
●005956●「我的身体在小学高年级的时候就已经长得很大了，所以初中之前，就在那里学习起了柔道」

○005957○Matsushita
●005957●松下

○005958○"I had no clue at the time, but as it so happened judo was the most prominent sport for visually impaired people."
●005958●「当时的我完全不知道，但柔道是视觉障碍者最主要的运动」

○005959○Matsushita
●005959●松下

○005960○"As a result the club was quite active, with a bunch of members and a highly experienced instructor."
●005960●「所以，社团相当活跃，部员相当的多，指导员的经验也相当丰富」

○005961○Matsushita
●005961●松下

○005962○"But still, in the beginning, I didn't know what I was doing at all."
●005962●「尽管如此，一开始也还是很不知所措」

○005963○Matsushita
●005963●松下

○005964○"After all, like I said earlier, I only had a vague sense for what judo was, at best."
●005964●「刚才也说过了，我对柔道知识的了解，仅仅是相当模糊的程度」

○005965○Matsushita
●005965●松下

○005966○"In judo for the visually impaired, matches start with you already grappling with your opponent."
●005966●「视觉障碍者的柔道比赛，是从已经和对手扭打住的状态开始的」

○005967○Matsushita
●005967●松下

○005968○"As such, it's much easier to pull off techniques."
●005968●「所以，很容易放出招式」

○005969○Matsushita
●005969●松下

○005970○"I had my very first match against an opponent who was much smaller than me, but they threw me like it was nothing."
●005970●「第一场比赛的时候，被比自己小很多的对手轻松地扔飞了」

○005971○Matsushita
●005971●松下

○005972○"Part of me was surprised, part of me was frustrated..."
●005972●「感到吃惊的同时，也很沮丧…」

○005973○Matsushita
●005973●松下

○005974○"It was a 'what the hell!' sort of feeling, in any case."
●005974●「总之就是『真他妈见鬼！』的感觉」

○005975○Matsushita
●005975●松下

○005976○"I was always a sore loser, you see."
●005976●「因为我并不服输」

○005977○...That determination of his probably played a part in his ability to overcome his blindness.
●005977●…也许这种毅力，也是使他克服失明这一障碍的因素之一吧。

○005978○It was very like him.
●005978●很像松下五段的风格。

○005979○Matsushita
●005979●松下

○005981○Matsushita
●005981●松下

○005982○"Unlike the more teamwork-oriented sports it let me really feel myself getting stronger as an individual, which was fun for me."
●005982●「和团队性的运动不同，有种自己正在变强的实感，很开心」

○005983○Matsushita
●005983●松下

○005984○"I poured that passion into my practice, and improved at a remarkable pace."
●005984●「我倾注着热情去训练，水平蒸蒸日上」

○005985○Matsushita
●005985●松下

○005986○"I produced solid results in my prefecture's tournament, and eventually I was even favored to win the national tournament. I made it pretty far."
●005986●「在县大赛上积累了实际的成绩，然后终于提名为了全国大赛的优胜候补，做到了这种地步」

○006488○In this world, at that very instant, it shined away over our heads.

●006611●松下

○006612○"That said, Hinako-san had a condition called amblyopia. It wasn't like she couldn't see anything at all; she could apparently make out vague, blurry outlines, at least."
●006612●「只是，阳菜子桑的情况，叫做弱视，并非完全没有视力，能够看到模糊的轮廓」

○006613○Matsushita
●006613●松下

○006615○Matsushita
●006615●松下

○006616○"But since she'd been that way from birth, she'd never seen anyone or anything clearly."
●006616●「然而，自出生以来，她从未清晰地看见过任何东西或是任何人」

○006617○Matsushita
●006617●松下

○006619○Matsushita
●006619●松下

●006620●「我们的母亲是姐妹，双方都只有一个子女」

●006621●松下

●006623●松下

●006624●「我能够记住的，和阳菜子桑最早的相遇，是在三岁左右」

○006625○Matsushita
●006625●松下

●006626●「那时她已经是初中生了」

○006627○Matsushita
●006627●松下

●006628●「阳菜子桑，总之就是想摸我的脸」

●006629●松下

●006630●「我只是个孩子，不可能会了解她的情况」

●006631●松下

○006632○"She touched me all over my face, and I remember really hating it."
●006632●「被她缠着摸脸的感觉很讨厌，到现在都还记得」

○006633○Matsushita
●006633●松下

○006635○Matsushita
●006635●松下

●006637●松下

●006638●「我当时的脸蛋相当柔嫩，所以她特别细心地触摸着」

○006639○Matsushita
●006639●松下

●006640●「对眼前的世界总是一片模糊的她来说，触摸是最好的，了解对方的方式」

●006641●松下

●006801●？？

○006802○"Yeah, I know that much, at least."
●006802●「嘛，这我还是知道的」

○006803○I was a bit bewildered by the question for a moment, since of course I knew that white canes existed, but then I put two and two together.
●006803●突然听到『baizhang』这个发音，让人很疑惑，但我觉得应该是『白杖』。

○006804○He was talking about the canes that blind people use to walk around safely.
●006804●视觉障碍者在行走时，所使用的拐杖。

○006805○Matsushita
●006805●松下

○006806○"I was already in elementary school at the time, so she must've been in high school."
●006806●「我那时候已经是小学生了，所以她应该是高中生吧」

○006807○Matsushita
●006807●松下

○006808○"I was walking around town with Hinako-san."
●006808●「我和阳菜子桑，一起在街上走着」

○006809○Matsushita
●006809●松下

○006810○"And then we happened to bump into some of my classmates."
●006810●「然后，突然就遇到了同学」

○006811○Matsushita
●006811●松下

○006812○"Children are cruel, you know? Hinako-san and her white cane must have been a rarity in their minds."
●006812●「孩子可是很残忍的。拄着白杖的阳菜子桑，很稀奇的吧」

○006813○Matsushita
●006813●松下

○006814○"One of them knew that it was the sort of cane blind people carry."
●006814●「其中的一个人，知道那是眼睛看不见的人所用的东西」

○006815○Matsushita
●006815●松下

○006816○"My classmates started teasing her."
●006816●「同学们开始嘲笑起了她」

○006817○Matsushita
●006817●松下

○006818○"...I didn't say a word to stop them. I just kept quiet."
●006818●「…我并没有驳斥，只是一直沉默着」

○006819○Matsushita
●006819●松下

○006820○"And then I left Hinako-san on her own, and went off to play with them."
●006820●「然后，我把阳菜子桑放在一边，去和他们一起玩了」

○006821○Matsushita
●006821●松下

○006822○"I stayed out until the evening, and when I got back to my aunt's house, Hinako-san had already arrived home."
●006822●「一直玩到了黄昏，回到叔母家之后，阳菜子桑已经先回来了」

○006823○Matsushita
●006823●松下

○006824○"My mother really let me have it."
●006824●「被母亲狠狠地训了一顿」

○006825○Matsushita
●006825●松下

○006826○"But Hinako-san tried to cover for me."
●006826●「但是，阳菜子桑却在护着我」

○006827○Hinako
●006827●阳菜子

○006828○"You just wanted to play with your friends, right? I'm sorry."
●006828●「你只是想和朋友一起玩吧。抱歉呢」

○006829○Hinako
●006829●阳菜子

○006830○"I'm totally fine on my own, it's okay."
●006830●「我的话，一个人也完全没关系的」

○006831○Hinako
●006831●阳菜子

○006832○"I'm tough, after all!"
●006832●「毕竟，我很坚强！」

○006833○nothing
●006833●nothing

○006834○nothing
●006834●nothing

○006835○nothing
●006835●nothing

○006836○nothing
●006836●nothing

○006837○nothing
●006837●nothing

○006838○Matsushita
●006838●松下

○006839○"...She said."
●006839●「…她这么说」

○006840○Matsushita
●006840●松下

○006841○"It was true. Just as she said, Hinako-san was tough enough you'd never think her vision was poor if you didn't already know it."
●006841●「确实，她说的没错，阳菜子桑是个相当坚强的人，别人几乎不会觉得她视力很差」

○006842○Matsushita
●006842●松下

○006843○"...Looking back on it, she really spoiled me."
●006843●「…现在想想，她真的非常娇惯我」

○006844○And after that, Godan lost his own vision to his illness.
●006844●在那之后，护騨因为疾病而失去了视力。

○006845○Matsushita
●006845●松下

○006846○"I don't remember very much about the nightmares I had during the week of my fever."
●006846●「我对高烧时噩梦般的那个星期，几乎没有什么记忆」

○006847○Matsushita
●006847●松下

○006848○"I never felt like I woke up during that time, either. By the time I came to my senses, I'd lost my vision."
●006848●「并没有过醒着的感觉。等到恢复知觉的时候，眼睛已经失去了光明」

○006849○Matsushita
●006849●松下

○006850○"I didn't understand what had happened..."
●006850●「不知道发生了什么…」

○006851○Matsushita
●006851●松下

○006852○"In my mind, it felt like I'd jumped from having my vision to lacking it in an instant. I couldn't help it."
●006852●「我的感觉，只是时间从看得见的时候，突然飞跃到了看不见的时候一样」

○006853○I tried to imagine how it had felt.
●006853●我想象了一下。

○006854○To open your eyes, but still see nothing.
●006854●明明睁开了眼睛，却什么也看不见。

○006855○A pitch-black world.
●006855●漆黑的世界。

○006856○Still able to hear, and still able to feel, if you reach out a hand.
●006856●还能够听到声音，伸出手的话，还能够有触感。

○006857○If you were in your own room, you might be able to identify your own bed or pillow.
●006857●如果在自己的房间里，也许能够分辨出枕头和被子。

○006858○In that sense, it wouldn't be any different from waking up normally.
●006858●睡觉和起床，不会有什么变化。

○006859○However, even with your eyes wide open, you couldn't see anything.
●006859●但是，即使睁大眼睛，也什么都看不见。

○006860○Matsushita
●006860●松下

○006861○"The first thing I did was touch my own face."
●006861●「我首先用手摸了摸自己的脸」

○006862○Matsushita
●006862●松下

○006863○"After I checked and found my eyes, my nose, my mouth and my ears still where they should be, I was a bit relieved."
●006863●「确认了眼睛，鼻子，嘴巴，耳朵都还在之后，稍微松了一口气」

○006864○Matsushita
●006864●松下

○006865○"I knew that I was still myself."
●006865●「知道了自己还是那个自己」

○006866○Matsushita
●006866●松下

○006867○"I'd been hospitalized, so I woke up in a bed."
●006867●「我住了院。醒来的时候在床上」

○006868○Matsushita
●006868●松下

○006869○"I'd been unconscious with a high fever for a week, so it was only natural."
●006869●「因为高烧而连续七天处于无意识状态，所以这是理所当然的」

○006870○Matsushita
●006870●松下

○006871○"I was examined, and I learned that not only had I truly lost my eyesight, but also that it would almost certainly never return."
●006871●「在接受了检查之后得知，不仅失去了视力，而且再也无法恢复了」

○006872○...Godan's explanation was impassive.
●006872●…护騨说的很轻快。

○006873○Matsushita
●006873●松下

○006874○"Hinako-san came to visit me in the hospital immediately."
●006874●「阳菜子桑立刻就来看望我了」

○006875○Hinako
●006875●阳菜子

○006876○"Dan-chan, it's okay. I'm here for you."
●006876●「騨酱，没关系。有我在呢」

○006877○nothing
●006877●nothing

○006878○nothing
●006878●nothing

○006879○nothing
●006879●nothing

○006880○nothing
●006880●nothing

○006881○nothing
●006881●nothing

○006882○Matsushita
●006882●松下

○006883○消去
●006883●消去

○006884○Matsushita
●006884●松下

○006885○"Hinako-san said that for my sake."
●006885●「阳菜子桑这么对我说」

○006886○Matsushita
●006886●松下

○006887○"She was certainly my senpai when it came to living with a disability, and in that sense her presence should've been reassuring."
●006887●「确实，作为残疾方面的前辈，她的存在使人相当安心」

○006888○Matsushita
●006888●松下

○006889○"But at the time, I didn't have the composure to think along those lines."
●006889●「然而，那时的我，根本没有去想这种事情的余裕」

○006890○Matsushita
●006890●松下

○006891○"I was forced to remember what I'd done on that day."
●006891●「我想起的是那天的事情」

○006892○Matsushita
●006892●松下

○006893○"I'd abandoned Hinako-san and gone off to play with my friends."
●006893●「我抛弃了阳菜子桑，去和朋友们一起玩了」

○006894○Matsushita
●006894●松下

○006895○"So, wasn't it my turn to be abandoned myself, this time?"
●006895●「那么，这次该轮到我被抛弃了吧？」

○006896○Matsushita
●006896●松下

○006897○"Soccer, basketball―I could no longer play the games I'd enjoyed before."
●006897●「喜欢的足球和篮球，已经无法再玩了」

○006898○Matsushita
●006898●松下

○006899○"And above all else, the darkness terrified me."
●006899●「在这之上，最可怕的是黑暗」

○006900○Matsushita
●006900●松下

○006901○"I couldn't see any of the things I'd known before."
●006901●「至今为止看过的东西，全都看不到了」

○006902○Matsushita
●006902●松下

○006903○"The day-to-day inconvenience wasn't the only problem."
●006903●「不仅是日常生活变得不方便」

○006904○Matsushita
●006904●松下

○006905○"I couldn't see people's expressions."
●006905●「看不到人的表情」

○006906○Matsushita
●006906●松下

○006907○"To put it another way, that means I couldn't understand what other people were thinking."
●006907●「换句话说，无法知道别人正在想什么」

○006908○Matsushita
●006908●松下

○006909○"My classmates came to visit me, as well."
●006909●「同学们也来看望我了」

○006910○Matsushita
●006910●松下

○006911○"They said all sorts of kind things to me."
●006911●「他们说了些安慰的话」

○006912○Matsushita
●006912●松下

○006913○"But, could it be they were really sneering at me? Was it my turn to be made fun of like that?"
●006913●「但也许，脸上其实是在嘲笑吧？轮到我被嘲弄了吧？」

○006914○Matsushita
●006914●松下

○006915○"If all you have to worry about is your words, you can say whatever you want to..."
●006915●「如果只是言语的话，说什么都可以…」

○006916○Matsushita
●006916●松下

○006917○"...Looking back on it, I was a pretty awful kid."
●006917●「…现在回想起来，我真是个糟糕的孩子啊」

○006918○Matsushita
●006918●松下

○006919○"But at the time, that's really what I thought."
●006919●「但是，那时的我真的是这么想的」

○006920○Matsushita
●006920●松下

○006921○"Even after I was discharged I couldn't work up the nerve to go through the rehab I needed to resume my daily life, and instead shut myself up in my room."
●006921●「即使出院之后，我也没有心情去进行恢复日常生活所需的康复治疗，而是把自己关在了房间里」

○006922○Matsushita
●006922●松下

○006923○"My parents acted like I was some sort of boil that would burst if they touched it, and left me alone."
●006923●「父母把我当作是烫手山芋一样，一直没吭声」

○006924○Matsushita
●006924●松下

○006925○"About a month later, Hinako-san came to visit me again."
●006925●「过了一个月左右，阳菜子桑又来拜访我了」

○006926○Matsushita
●006926●松下

○006927○"...'Dan-chan', she said."
●006927●「…『騨酱』，她说」

○006928○She walked into my room, went straight over to the corner I was huddled in and threw her arms around me.
●006928●她走进了房间里，紧紧地抱住了坐在房间角落里的我。

○006929○In the past I'd have likely struggled, but that time, I just passively let it happen.
●006929●如果是以前的话，我会感到讨厌，但那时的我，只是任其发展下去。

○006930○Matsushita
●006930●松下

○006931○"She didn't say a word. She just held me there, tightly."
●006931●「她什么都没说，只是一直抱着我」

○006932○Matsushita
●006932●松下

○006933○"I didn't say a word, either."
●006933●「我也，什么都没说」

○006934○Matsushita
●006934●松下

○006935○"I just stayed there, perfectly still within her embrace."
●006935●「我，只是默默地，依偎在她的怀里」

○006936○Matsushita
●006936●松下

○006937○"Hey, Hinako-nee-chan. What's it like being blind?"
●006937●「呐，阳菜姐。眼睛变得看不见是什么感觉？」

○006938○I finally spoke.
●006938●我终于开了口。

○006939○Hinako
●006939●阳菜子

○006940○"I wonder?"
●006940●「不知道呢」

○006941○I was somehow sure that she'd tilted her head in confusion.
●006941●我想，她一定正疑惑地歪着头吧。

○006942○Hinako
●006942●阳菜子

○006943○"I'm sorry, but I'm not really sure."
●006943●「抱歉呢，我不太明白」

○006944○Hinako
●006944●阳菜子

○006945○"I mean, I've never been able to see, after all."
●006945●「因为，我的眼睛从来就没能看见过」

○006946○Hinako
●006946●阳菜子

○006947○"So I can't understand what you're going through, Dan-chan..."
●006947●「所以，我无法了解騨酱的痛苦…」

○006948○Hinako
●006948●阳菜子

○006949○"I'm sorry... I'm so sorry, Dan-chan..."
●006949●「对不起，对不起，騨酱」

○006950○Hinako
●006950●阳菜子

○006951○"I'm sorry I can't understand it."
●006951●「无法了解你，真是对不起」

○006952○She apologized over and over, sobbing in between.
●006952●她反复地道着歉，夹杂着呜咽声。

○006953○Why would she be apologizing, I wondered?
●006953●为什么，她要道歉呢。

○006954○Within her arms, I felt like I was about to cry, too.
●006954●在阳菜子桑怀中的我，感觉也快要哭了出来。

○006955○Matsushita
●006955●松下

○006956○"I told her not to cry, though I pretty much had to squeeze the words out of myself."
●006956●「我几乎像是挤出话来一样告诉她，不要哭」

○006957○Hinako
●006957●阳菜子

○006958○"Yeagh!"
●006958●「嗯呜！」

○006959○Matsushita
●006959●松下

○006960○"It was the weirdest sound, like a mix of a hiccup, a sob and a 'yeah'. And so..."
●006960●「那是相当奇怪的声音，像是打嗝声，抽泣声和『嗯』混在一起一样。所以…」

○006961○Matsushita
●006961●松下

○006962○"...Without even thinking about it, I laughed."
●006962●「我不由自主地，噗嗤一声笑了出来」

○006963○Matsushita
●006963●松下

○006964○"I told her not to cry, though I practically had to squeeze the words out of myself."
●006964●「我几乎像是挤出话来一样告诉她，不要哭」

○006965○Hinako
●006965●阳菜子

○006966○"Yeagh!"
●006966●「嗯呜！」

○006967○Matsushita
●006967●松下

○006968○"It was the strangest sound, like a mix of a hiccup, a sob and a 'yeah'. And so..."
●006968●「那是相当奇怪的声音，像是打嗝声，抽泣声和『嗯』混在一起一样。所以…」

○006969○Matsushita
●006969●松下

○006970○"...Without even thinking about it, I laughed."
●006970●「我不由自主地，噗嗤地笑了出来」

○006971○Hinako
●006971●阳菜子

○006972○"C'mon, don't laugh at me!"
●006972●「真是的，不要再笑了！」

○006973○Hinako-san sounded almost like she was laughing herself as she spoke.
●006973●阳菜子桑说话时，像是在笑着一样。

○006974○We both cracked up after that. It was just too comical.
●006974●然后，两个人一起笑了起来，相当滑稽。

○006975○Hinako-san suggested that we walk around outside, just a little.
●006975●阳菜子桑提出了到外面稍微走走的提议。

○006976○Strangely enough, I didn't feel like resisting.
●006976●不可思议的是，我完全没有抵触的感觉。

○006977○She took my hand and led me down the staircase.
●006977●她牵着我的手，带我走下了楼梯。

○006978○Hinako
●006978●阳菜子

○006979○"Are you okay? You're not scared?"
●006979●「没关系吧？不害怕吧？」

○006980○Even my own house, the home I'd been so familiar with, was terrifying now that I couldn't see it.
●006980●即使是在熟悉的自己的家，看不见的话也很可怕。

○006981○I couldn't help but imagine that I'd fall with each and every step that I took.
●006981●感觉每踏出下一步，都会摔到下面去。

○006982○As such, I could barely ever bring myself to descend the staircase.
●006982●所以，我几乎没有下过楼梯。

○006983○But somehow, together with her, I could handle them just fine.
●006983●但是，和她在一起的话，就没关系了。

○006984○My parents seemed shocked to see Hinako-san emerge with me in tow.
●006984●父母看到和阳菜子桑一起出来的我，也相当吃惊。

○006985○This was the first time in ages I'd left the house, after all.
●006985●这是我很久以来，第一次走出家门。

○006986○Hinako
●006986●阳菜子

○006987○"Hey, can you tell?"
●006987●「呐，能感觉到吗？」

○006988○She asked me suddenly.
●006988●她突然问了我。

○006989○Whatever she was asking about, I couldn't tell anything at all, so I shook my head.
●006989●我不知道她指的是什么，左右直摇头。

○006990○白
●006990●白

○006991○Hinako
●006991●阳菜子

○006992○"Hey, the sun's warm, isn't it?"
●006992●「那个啊，太阳很暖和吧？」

○006993○Hinako
●006993●阳菜子

○006994○"And the wind feels nice, doesn't it?"
●006994●「而且，风的感觉也很舒服吧？」

○006995○I didn't answer her directly.
●006995●我并没有直接回答她的问题。

○006996○Matsushita
●006996●松下

○006997○"...What day is it again, today?"
●006997●「…今天，是几号了？」

○006998○Instead, I asked her my own question.
●006998●而是反过来提问。

○006999○I'd lost all sense of time, at that point.
●006999●我已经失去了时间感。

○007000○Or rather, I hadn't had the composure to keep track of it.
●007000●或者换句话说，根本没有余裕去在意这种事情了。

○007001○Hinako
●007001●阳菜子

○007002○"Right now's the beginning of May, right at the start of the long holiday period."
●007002●「现在是五月，连休刚刚结束」

○007003○Even though I'd gone up a grade level, I'd stayed shut at home without even once attending school.
●007003●即使年级已经变了，我也没有去上学，一直闭门不出。

○007004○It felt like my own time had finally resumed its flow as well, swept along with the breeze.
●007004●随着风的吹过，我的时间，终于开始流动了。

○007005○My senses were returning to me.
●007005●我的感觉回来了。

○007006○Matsushita
●007006●松下

○007007○"It really is warm."
●007007●「很暖和呢」

○007008○I felt the warmth of the sun on my cheeks, and the spring breeze on my skin.
●007008●脸颊感受到了太阳的温暖，肌肤感受到了春风。

○007009○I could smell the trees, too.
●007009●然后还有，树的味道。

○007010○Hinako
●007010●阳菜子

○007011○"Yeah, it's a sweet, refreshing sort of smell that almost tickles my nose."
●007011●「嗯，感觉鼻子里面痒痒的，很甜，很清爽的味道」

○007012○Hinako
●007012●阳菜子

○007013○"That's the smell of spring."
●007013●「这是春天的味道」

○007014○Matsushita
●007014●松下

○007015○"I don't... really understand..."
●007015●「不是…太明白…」

○007016○Hinako
●007016●阳菜子

○007017○"Even if you don't understand now, you'll get it more and more as time goes by."
●007017●「即使现在不明白，也会渐渐地明白的」

○007018○I was still suspicious of everything. Would I really understand some day?
●007018●我还是很疑神疑鬼的。这么一天真的会到来吗？

○007019○Hinako
●007019●阳菜子

○007020○"You definitely will."
●007020●「绝对会到来的」

○007021○Hinako
●007021●阳菜子

○007022○"Plus, even though I can't see, I've never been troubled by it."
●007022●「而且，就算眼睛看不见，也没有什么困扰的」

○007023○Hinako
●007023●阳菜子

○007024○"Even if I were to lose the use of my legs, or lose my hearing in the future, for example..."
●007024●「如果今后，我的脚不能动了的话，或者耳朵听不见了的话…」

○007025○Hinako
●007025●阳菜子

○007026○"I'd probably be at a bit of a loss, at first."
●007026●「大概，会在一开始感到有些困惑吧」

○007027○Hinako
●007027●阳菜子

○007028○"But, I'm sure I'd get used to it."
●007028●「但是，我相信自己一定会习惯的」

○007029○Matsushita
●007029●松下

○007030○"........"
●007030●「…………」

○007031○For some reason, hearing that almost brought me to tears.
●007031●不知道为什么，我又想哭了。

○007032○Seeing her strength was incredibly difficult for me.
●007032●她的坚强，让我十分痛苦。

○007033○She must have been able to tell I was about to cry, and misunderstood the reason why.
●007033●她肯定注意到了我即将流泪的样子，并且误解了原因。

○007034○Hinako
●007034●阳菜子

○007035○"You're still little, aren't you, Dan-chan? It must be tough."
●007035●「騨酱还很小，一定很辛苦呢」

○007036○She hugged me as she spoke.
●007036●她在说着的同时，抱住了我的身体。

○007037○Matsushita
●007037●松下

○007038○"Hinako-san was warm."
●007038●「阳菜子桑很暖和」

○007039○Matsushita
●007039●松下

○007040○"Hinako-san was soft."
●007040●「阳菜子桑很柔软」

○007041○Matsushita
●007041●松下

○007042○"Hinako-san was kind."
●007042●「阳菜子桑很温柔」

○007043○Matsushita
●007043●松下

○007044○"And Hinako-san smelled nice."
●007044●「而且，阳菜子桑的味道很好闻」

○007045○Matsushita
●007045●松下

○007046○"It was a smell that felt like being wrapped up in a warm blanket. A reassuring smell."
●007046●「就像是被温暖的被子包裹着一样，令人安心的味道」

○007047○Matsushita
●007047●松下

○007048○"I thought that it must be the smell of the sun."
●007048●「我觉得，这就是太阳的味道吧」

○007049○Matsushita
●007049●松下

○007050○"And that it must be the smell of spring, as well."
●007050●「而且，这一定，也是春天的味道吧」

○007052○"Hinako-san was warm."
●007052●「阳菜子桑很暖和」

●007063●松下

○007064○"And that it must be the smell of spring, as well."
●007064●「而且，这一定，也是春天的味道吧」

○007065○Matsushita
●007065●松下

○007066○"...Hina-nee-chan, something smells nice."
●007066●「…阳菜姐，味道很好闻」

○007067○I slowly muttered those few words, and Hinako-san paused for a moment. Then...
●007067●我小声地说着。阳菜子桑安静了一会儿。然后。

○007068○Hinako
●007068●阳菜子

○007069○"I'm sure that must be the smell of the sun."
●007069●「那一定是太阳的味道哦」

○007070○Hinako
●007070●阳菜子

○007071○"I just washed my uniform yesterday, after all."
●007071●「因为我昨天洗了制服」

○007072○That's what she said.
●007072●她这么说。

○007073○Matsushita
●007073●松下

○007074○"I wanted to say that it was Hinako-san herself that smelled nice, but I was too embarrassed."
●007074●「我本来想说，是阳菜子桑自己的味道，但因为太羞耻了而没能说出口」

○007075○Matsushita
●007075●松下

○007076○"She seemed so huge, back then."
●007076●「她很高大」

○007077○Matsushita
●007077●松下

○007078○"I told you that I was big myself, compared to my classmates, but in the end I was still an elementary schooler."
●007078●「虽然我比同级学生的个子要大，但毕竟，还是小学生」

○007079○Matsushita
●007079●松下

○007080○"Compared to a high schooler like Hinako-san, of course I'd be small."
●007080●「和身为女高中生的阳菜子桑相比，肯定是要小的」

○007081○Matsushita
●007081●松下

○007082○"My head only came up to about her chest or so, and it felt like I was totally wrapped up in her."
●007082●「我的头，只顶到她胸口的附近，就好像是被她裹住了一样」

●007083●nothing

●007084●nothing

●007085●nothing

●007086●nothing

●007089●「…我从未知道」

○007090○Matsushita
●007090●松下

○007091○"No, I just didn't notice."
●007091●「不，只是从未注意到」

○007092○Matsushita
●007092●松下

○007093○"It never even occurred to me to think about it."
●007093●「从来就没有去在意过」

○007094○Matsushita
●007094●松下

○007095○"About how a girl like her, who could barely see from the moment she was born and always seemed so carefree, could have that huge of a presence."
●007095●「生来弱视，总是如此悠然的她，会是如此巨大的存在」

○007096○Matsushita
●007096●松下

○007097○"...I told her I was okay, that it was fine, but I was embarrassed with myself for being fawned upon like that."
●007097●「…我对她说，没关系，没问题，但我被这么宠着，觉得很不好意思」

○007098○Matsushita
●007098●松下

○007099○"So to change the conversation's atmosphere, I decided to ask."
●007099●「然后，我为了改变气氛，问了个问题」

○007100○Matsushita
●007100●松下

○007101○"Hey... are there any sports I can do...?"
●007101●「呐…我还有能进行的运动吗…」

○007102○Matsushita
●007102●松下

○007103○"'Of course there are,' she answered."
●007103●「她说，当然有哦」

○007104○Matsushita
●007104●松下

●007106●松下

●007143●白

○007144○Hinako
●007144●阳菜子

○007145○"Why don't you come visit me at the school for the blind I go to?"
●007145●「你也来我上的盲校玩吧？」

○007146○Hinako
●007146●阳菜子

○007147○"I'm sure it'll be fun for you, too, Dan-chan."
●007147●「我相信，騨酱一定也会很开心的」

○007148○I was sure she was smiling beneath that bright, cheerful springtime sun.
●007148●我相信，她正在五月明媚的阳光下笑着。

○007149○Hinako
●007149●阳菜子

○007150○"The sun's amazing, isn't it?"
●007150●「太阳，很厉害呢」

○007151○Hinako
●007151●阳菜子

○007152○"It's so warm, even if you can't see it."
●007152●「即使看不见，也是这么温暖」

○007153○Matsushita
●007153●松下

○007154○"She was sure right about that."
●007154●「确实，她说的没错」

○007155○Matsushita
●007155●松下

○007156○"Back when I could see, it was so obvious I never even noticed."
●007156●「在眼睛还能看见的时候，因为过于理所当然，从来没有注意到」

○007157○Matsushita
●007157●松下

●007158●「说不定，还有很多因为这样而不知道的东西」

●007163●松下

●007164●「说不定，还有很多因为这样而不知道的东西」

●007165●松下

●007166●「但是，阳菜姐，更温暖哦」

○007167○Matsushita

●007168●「…而且，味道也很好」

○007169○Matsushita
●007169●松下

●007170●「我小声地念叨着」

●007171●松下

●007172●「她照亮了我的心」

●007185●阳菜子

●007186●「加油吧，少年！」

○007187○Matsushita
●007187●松下

○007188○"Yeah."
●007188●「嗯」

○007189○I nodded meekly.
●007189●我顺从地点了点头。

○007190○nothing
●007190●nothing

○007191○nothing
●007191●nothing

●007192●nothing

○007193○nothing
●007193●nothing

●007194●nothing

○007195○Otonashi
●007195●音无

○007196○消去
●007196●消去

○007197○...I knew nothing about this Hinako-san that Godan was telling me about.
●007197●…我对护騨所说的阳菜子同学一无所知。

○007198○However, I could still tell that she was an incredible person.
●007198●但是，她一定是个很棒的人。

○007199○I could tell that from the way he spoke about her alone.
●007199●仅仅从护騨的口气上，就能够感觉到了。

○007200○Matsushita
●007200●松下

○007201○"Hinako-san led me to her school for the blind."
●007201●「我被阳菜子桑带到了盲校」

○007202○Matsushita
●007202●松下

○007203○"I ended up taking judo lessons there."
●007203●「然后，开始练起了柔道」

○007204○Matsushita
●007204●松下

○007205○"Judo was really fun."
●007205●「柔道很有趣」

○007206○Matsushita
●007206●松下

○007207○"I was so happy to discover something that I could do even after I lost my vision, y'know?"
●007207●「我找到了眼睛看不见也能做的事情，真的很开心哦」

○007208○Matsushita
●007208●松下

○007209○"I got stronger and stronger at a crazy pace, and ended up really standing out."
●007209●「我的水平突飞猛进，很快就崭露头角了」

○007210○Matsushita
●007210●松下

○007211○"Around the time I entered junior high school, she was making her way out into society."
●007211●「在我升入初中的时候，她已经走入社会了」

○007212○Matsushita
●007212●松下

○007213○"After graduating from college, Hinako-san began working in welfare."
●007213●「大学毕业后的阳菜子桑，从事起了福利工作」

○007214○Matsushita
●007214●松下

○007215○"She said there were things she wouldn't be able to do if it weren't for her weak vision."
●007215●「她说，有些事情正是因为自己的弱视才能做到」

○007216○Matsushita
●007216●松下

○007217○"...She was almost like the sun, herself."
●007217●「…她就像是太阳一样」

○007218○Matsushita
●007218●松下

○007219○"...She was a huge, and warm, and kind person."
●007219●「…是个很大，很温暖，很温柔的人」

○007220○Matsushita Godan spoke slowly, reflecting upon his own words.
●007220●护騨咬着嘴唇，慢慢地说着。

○007221○There was no way I could poke fun at him now.
●007221●这里可不能开玩笑。

○007222○I silently listened.
●007222●我默默地听着。

○007223○Matsushita
●007223●松下

○007224○"I realized it."
●007224●「我注意到了」

○007225○Matsushita
●007225●松下

○007226○"I'd fallen in love with her."
●007226●「我，爱上她了」

○007227○He sounded a bit embarrassed, unsurprisingly, but his expression was earnest.
●007227●听起来有些害羞，但他的表情相当认真。

○007228○Matsushita
●007228●松下

○007229○"'Course, I couldn't even imagine telling her how I felt..."
●007229●「当然，把这种想法告诉她，根本无法想象…」

○007230○He added on one final note to his story...
●007230●他补充了一句。

○007231○If he looked as handsome then as he does now, I figured he might've had a chance, actually...
●007231●如果当时的他和现在一样帅的话，说不定有戏…。

●007290●松下

○007292○Matsushita
●007292●松下

●007295●「但是，我不想输」

●007467●松下

●007468●「如此悠然，让我被钓上了她的钩，点了点头」

○007469○Matsushita
●007469●松下

○007470○消去
●007470●消去

○007471○Hinako
●007471●阳菜子

○007472○"I found a really great place!"
●007472●「我发现了一个很棒的地方哦！」

○007473○Matsushita
●007473●松下

○007474○"I walked along, Hinako-san leading me by the hand."
●007474●「阳菜子桑牵着我的手走着」

○007475○Matsushita
●007475●松下

○007476○"I wondered what I was even doing, embarrassed by the softness of her hand the whole while..."
●007476●「我到底在做什么呢？我带着这样的疑问，还有她柔软的手带来的害羞…」

○007477○Her voice, which in the past I'd heard from far above me, now came from somewhere around the level of my chest.
●007477●她的声音，曾经是从我的头顶传来，现在则是从我胸口的高度传来。

○007478○...It made me really feel how much time had passed by.
●007478●…让人感到了岁月的流逝。

○007479○I wondered; what sort of woman had Hinako-san had grown into?
●007479●阳菜子桑，变成了什么样的女性呢？

○007480○I could hear her voice.
●007480●能听到她的声音。

○007481○When we touched, she was warm.
●007481●触碰到她的话，很暖和。

○007482○Just as she'd told me so long ago, my blindness no longer troubled me.
●007482●就像她以前说的那样，即使眼睛看不见，也不会再有什么困扰了。

○007483○But still... it was only natural that I'd wish I could see her face.
●007483●尽管如此…想要看到阳菜子的脸，也是很自然的吧。

○007484○The face I knew was the one she'd had back when I was young.
●007484●我所记住的那张脸，还是在小时候看到的。

○007485○Hinako
●007485●阳菜子

○007486○"We're here."
●007486●「到了哦」

○007487○We'd walked for about two or three minutes, probably.
●007487●行走的时间，不过两三分钟这样吧。

○007488○Wherever we were, it seemed to be within the grounds of the tournament venue.
●007488●好像是比赛会场里的地方。

○007489○The first thing I noticed was the powerful smell of dirt.
●007489●首先感觉到的，是强烈的泥土气味。

○007490○Rising up from the ground was the muggy scent of summer.
●007490●从地面上扑鼻而来的，是夏天的味道。

○007491○Matsushita
●007491●松下

○007492○"...Where are we?"
●007492●「…这里是？」

○007493○Hinako
●007493●阳菜子

○007494○"It seems like they must've just watered them."
●007494●「好像，刚刚浇过了水呢」

○007495○Hinako-san must have been feeling the same things I was.
●007495●阳菜子桑也感受到了同样的东西吧。

○007496○Hinako
●007496●阳菜子

●007497●「啊哈哈，有点厉害呢」

○007498○I muttered, with a forced smile.
●007498●我一边苦笑，一边小声哔哔着。

●007499●松下

●007500●「但是，我不讨厌这种味道哦」

●007532●「但是，我不讨厌这种味道」

○007533○It felt like my sense of smell was a lot more sensitive than it had been before.
●007533●感觉自己的嗅觉比以前要灵敏了。

○007534○The smell of evaporating water was uniquely summery, and lit a faint fire of courage within me.
●007534●洒出的水蒸发着，散发着夏天独有的气息，在我的心里点燃了一丝勇气的灯火。

●007535●松下

○007537○Hinako
●007537●阳菜子

○007538○"Yeah. Try touching one, first. Here."
●007538●「嗯，先摸摸看吧。来」

○007539○As she spoke, she reached out above us, my hand still clasped in hers.
●007539●她一边说着，一边握住了我的手，往上伸了出去。

○007540○Hinako
●007540●阳菜子

○007541○"Hmmm, maybe it's a bit higher?"
●007541●「呜—嗯，高了吧？」

○007542○Hinako
●007542●阳菜子

○007543○"...You really can't tell when you can't see them, can you?"
●007543●「…果然看不见的话，是没法知道的呢」

○007544○She sounded a bit troubled.
●007544●她的声音听起来很困扰。

○007545○Matsushita
●007545●松下

○007546○"Hina-nee-chan?"
●007546●「阳菜姐？」

○007547○Just when I was about to ask her what she was trying to do, our hands bumped into something.
●007547●就在我想问她到底要干什么的时候，我的手和她的手，同时碰到了什么东西。

○007548○Hinako
●007548●阳菜子

○007549○"Aaaah, there it is! Thank goodness."
●007549●「啊，中了。太好了」

○007550○Matsushita
●007550●松下

○007551○"...What is this?"
●007551●「…这是？」

○007552○What could this thing I'm touching be?
●007552●我现在碰到的是什么？

○007553○It felt like some sort of long, narrow rod.
●007553●像是一根细长的棍子。

○007554○Its surface felt rough and uneven. It felt like there were short hairs growing from it.
●007554●表面粗糙，凹凸不平。上面好像长着细小的毛。

○007555○It was just thin enough for me to grip it in one hand.
●007555●粗细程度的话，刚好能用一只手握住。

○007556○Hinako
●007556●阳菜子

○007557○"I guess I can't reach up any higher than this."
●007557●「看来我没法在往上伸了啊」

○007558○It seemed Hinako-san was stretched as far up as she could manage. Judging by her voice, she was really straining herself.
●007558●阳菜子桑好像正在拼命地踮脚伸手。声音好像有些痛苦。

○007559○Hinako
●007559●阳菜子

○007560○"You can reach higher, right, Dan-chan?"
●007560●「騨酱的话，可以伸的更高的吧？」

○007561○Hinako
●007561●阳菜子

○007562○"Try following it just a little bit higher up."
●007562●「再往上伸一点」

○007563○I stretched out my hand, like she told me to.
●007563●我照她所说的，把手伸了出去。

○007564○As I followed that rough rod upward, reaching my arm out as far as I could, my hand reached something new.
●007564●我追寻着粗糙的触感，拼命地把手臂往上伸，然后碰到了什么东西。

○007565○Some sort of big lump was attached to the end of the rod.
●007565●棍子的顶上，有一个大块的东西。

○007566○It was gnarled, and soft, and it rustled...
●007566●有些凹凸不平，蓬蓬松松的，而且有些分散…。

○007567○Neither it nor the rod felt man-made.
●007567●无论是这东西，还是刚才的棍子，都没有人造的感觉。

○007568○This sort of softness could only be something natural.
●007568●这种柔软的程度，一定是自然的产物。

○007569○Matsushita
●007569●松下

○007570○"...A flower?"
●007570●「…花？」

○007571○Matsushita
●007571●松下

○007572○"Is this... a sunflower?"
●007572●「这是…向日葵？」

○007573○It brought a certain memory back to mind.
●007573●脑海里浮现出了记忆。

○007574○A flower I'd seen when I was young.
●007574●小时候看到的那朵花。

○007575○A huge, boldly blooming flower of summer.
●007575●硕大的，盛开的夏日之花。

○007576○Hinako
●007576●阳菜子

○007577○"Yeah, that's right. It's a sunflower."
●007577●「嗯，正确。是向日葵」

○007578○Hinako-san laughed happily beside me.
●007578●阳菜子桑在旁边开心地笑着。

○007579○Hinako
●007579●阳菜子

○007580○"I really like sunflowers."
●007580●「我呢，很喜欢向日葵」

○007581○Hinako
●007581●阳菜子

○007582○"Of course I've never seen them properly myself, but I can recognize them even though they're blurry, you know?"
●007582●「当然，我没有好好地亲眼看过，但是在模糊的情况下也能够分辨出来哦？」

○007583○Hinako
●007583●阳菜子

○007584○"They're yellow, and big... Even with my poor vision, I can tell."
●007584●「黄黄的，大大的，眼睛不好的我也能看出来」

○007585○Hinako
●007585●阳菜子

○007586○"And they say that they bloom to face the sun, too."
●007586●「而且，据说向日葵是朝着太阳的方向绽放的」

○007587○Hinako
●007587●阳菜子

○007588○"Did you know that, Dan-chan?"
●007588●「騨酱知道吗？」

○007589○Matsushita
●007589●松下

○007590○"I..."
●007590●「我…」

○007591○I was just about to reply, but then I stopped.
●007591●说到一半的我，停了下来。

○007592○Everything I could think of to say felt too boorish for the moment.
●007592●在这种时候插嘴的话，会显得很失礼。

○007593○Hinako
●007593●阳菜子

○007594○"If a time ever comes when you don't know where the sun is, if you touch a sunflower, you'll know where to find it."
●007594●「如果，不知道太阳在哪里的话，只要碰一碰向日葵，就能知道太阳在哪里了」

○007595○Hinako
●007595●阳菜子

○007596○"And if you face that direction, the sun will always be there."
●007596●「只要朝着那个方向，太阳一定随时都在」

○007597○Hinako
●007597●阳菜子

○007598○"When I'm lost, or worried, or depressed, they can even tell someone with poor eyesight like me where I can find the light."
●007598●「迷茫、烦恼、失落的时候，即使是像我这样视力不好的人，它也会告诉我光明所在的地方」

○007599○Hinako
●007599●阳菜子

○007600○"...That's the feeling I get."
●007600●「…我有这样的感觉」

○007601○Hinako
●007601●阳菜子

○007602○"If this sunflower were just a little bit smaller, I could've touched it, too."
●007602●「如果这朵向日葵再小一点的话，我就也能够碰到了」

○007603○Hinako
●007603●阳菜子

○007604○"That's why I like sunflowers."
●007604●「所以，我喜欢向日葵」

○007605○Hinako
●007605●阳菜子

○007606○"...They sound a bit like my name, too. Hinako and himawari."
●007606●「…和我的名字很像呢」

○007607○She added on that one last note, sounding a bit shy.
●007607●她带着害羞的语气，补充了一句。

○007608○Hinako
●007608●阳菜子

○007609○"When you're lost or worried, just turn your face to the sun."
●007609●「如果感到迷茫，或是烦恼的话，就望向太阳吧」

○007610○Hinako
●007610●阳菜子

○007611○"And when you don't know where you should look to find it, just ask the sunflowers."
●007611●「然后，如果不知道该望向哪里的时候，就去问向日葵吧」

○007612○I brushed my fingers across the sunflower.
●007612●我摸了摸那朵向日葵。

○007613○Its huge, blooming flower pointed upward at a diagonal into the sky.
●007613●大大的花朵，朝着斜向上的方向绽开。

○007614○There was barely a breeze, and the air was still and humid.
●007614●刮着的风很小，空气相当闷热。

○007615○The ambient heat was so intense, I couldn't even tell where the summer sun was in the sky.
●007615●夏天的太阳把周围的温度加热的如此之高，根本不知道它在哪里。

○007616○I couldn't tell.
●007616●我不知道。

○007617○I couldn't tell, but the flower gave me a hint that traced out a path towards it, right in front of my eyes.
●007617●我不知道，但我的眼前就有指引着道路的线索。

○007618○Or rather, right above my head, since it's the sun and all.
●007618●不，因为是太阳，就在头顶吧。

○007619○...I wondered if that was what Hinako-san was trying to tell me.
●007619●…阳菜子桑，是想告诉我这一点吗。

○007620○Hinako
●007620●阳菜子

○007621○"Well, have you calmed down a bit?"
●007621●「怎么样，冷静下来了吗？」

○007622○Matsushita
●007622●松下

○007623○"...Yeah."
●007623●「…嗯」

○007624○Even so, I imagine my reply still sounded a bit shaken.
●007624●尽管如此，我回答的声音还是有些颤抖。

○007625○Hinako
●007625●阳菜子

○007626○"I'd love to see just a bit more."
●007626●「还想再看一点呢」

○007627○Hinako
●007627●阳菜子

○007628○"That's it. Dan-chan... stay really still, okay?"
●007628●「对了。騨酱…就这样不要动哦」

○007629○What's she planning on doing?
●007629●她打算干什么？

○007630○A mere moment after I had that thought...
●007630●就在我刚开始思考的时候。

○007631○Hinako
●007631●阳菜子

○007632○"Squeeze!"
●007632●「贴贴！」

○007633○I heard her voice, and at the same time, I felt a warmth around my midsection.
●007633●我听到了声音，与此同时，

○007634○Matsushita
●007634●松下

○007635○"Eh, Hina-nee-chan?"
●007635●「诶，阳菜姐？」

○007636○Hinako
●007636●阳菜子

○007637○"Ooooh, you've really grown up nice and big, haven't you, Dan-chan?"
●007637●「呜，騨酱完全已经长大了呢」

○007638○Hinako
●007638●阳菜子

○007639○"I was so much bigger than you back in the day, too."
●007639●「以前，我比你要大得多呢」

○007640○Hinako-san was clinging to me.
●007640●阳菜子桑紧紧地贴着我。

○007641○I'm sure she was planning on embracing me, actually.
●007641●不，她本来是打算抱住我的吧。

○007642○She wrapped her arms around my back, and pressed her face into my chest.
●007642●阳菜子桑把双臂绕在了我的背上，头贴在了我的胸口。

○007643○Matsushita
●007643●松下

○007644○"L-Let go."
●007644●「放，放开我」

○007645○Hinako
●007645●阳菜子

○007646○"I thought doing this might help you calm down."
●007646●「这样一来，騨酱就能放松下来了」

○007647○I heard her muffled voice coming from down below me.
●007647●从下面传来了含混不清的声音。

○007648○Matsushita
●007648●松下

○007649○"I-It's embarrassing."
●007649●「太，太羞耻了」

○007650○Hinako
●007650●阳菜子

○007651○"Oh?"
●007651●「是吗？」

○007652○Hinako
●007652●阳菜子

○007653○"You used to be so much cuter, but..."
●007653●「以前的騨酱，明明更可爱的…」

○007654○Hinako
●007654●阳菜子

○007655○"Now you must be in your rebellious phase..."
●007655●「现在进了叛逆期…」

○007656○Hinako
●007656●阳菜子

○007657○"Waaaah..."
●007657●「呜诶—…」

○007658○...She's definitely not actually crying.
●007658●…绝对是假哭。

○007659○Hinako
●007659●阳菜子

○007660○"Oh, fiiiiine."
●007660●「没办法了啊」

○007661○Hinako-san broke away from me as she spoke.
●007661●阳菜子桑一边说着，一边离开了。

○007662○I was a bit relieved, but then...
●007662●就在我刚松了一口气的时候。

○007663○Hinako
●007663●阳菜子

○007664○"Dan-chan, crouch down for a second."
●007664●「騨酱，稍微蹲一下」

○007665○Matsushita
●007665●松下

○007666○"Eh...?"
●007666●「诶…」

○007667○Hinako
●007667●阳菜子

○007668○"C'mon, just crouch!"
●007668●「行啦，蹲下吧！」

○007669○Hinako
●007669●阳菜子

○007670○"I can't pat your head if you don't, right?"
●007670●「要不然的话，我就没法摸你的头了吧」

○007671○She sounded a bit pouty, and I decided to play along.
●007671●听着她闹别扭的声音，我决定老实地顺从她。

○007672○Hinako
●007672●阳菜子

○007673○"......"
●007673●「……」

○007674○However, even when I crouched down and waited she didn't pat my head.
●007674●然而，我明明摆好了姿势等待着，但阳菜子桑并没有摸我的头。

○007675○I heard her sigh from oddly close by, too.
●007675●而且不知为何，感觉呼吸声离的很近。

○007676○Then I felt a strange, soft sensation on my cheek.
●007676●脸颊上传来了轻柔的触感。

○007677○It was just a little bit warm―Hinako-san's hand.
●007677●微微温暖的感觉，这是阳菜子桑的手。

○007678○Matsushita
●007678●松下

○007679○"W-What!?"
●007679●「什，什么！」

○007680○It surprised me even more than the hug had.
●007680●比刚才的拥抱还要令人惊讶。

○007681○Hinako
●007681●阳菜子

○007682○"Don't move."
●007682●「别动」

○007683○She brushed her hands across my face.
●007683●她边说边抚摸着我的脸。

○007684○My eyes, my nose, my lips, my ears... her soft hands felt me all over.
●007684●眼睛，鼻子，嘴唇，耳朵，被她柔软的手抚摸得发痒。

○007685○Hinako
●007685●阳菜子

○007686○"I was thinking about how I couldn't see your face, Dan-chan."
●007686●「都看不到騨酱的脸了呢」

○007687○To her, with her weak eyesight, to see and to touch were one and the same.
●007687●对弱视的她来说，看和触碰的意思是一样的。

○007688○Hinako
●007688●阳菜子

○007689○"I mean, you don't let me touch you at all, lately."
●007689●「因为，騨酱最近都不让我碰了」

○007690○Hinako
●007690●阳菜子

○007691○"You feel kinda distant."
●007691●「总感觉，很疏远呢」

○007692○Matsushita
●007692●松下

○007693○"T-That's..."
●007693●「那，那是…」

○007694○I couldn't exactly say that it was because I didn't know how to cope with my feelings for her.
●007694●我无法告诉她，是因为我不知道该如何对待和她的感情才这样的。

○007695○Matsushita
●007695●松下

○007696○"Too close, too close, I said..."
●007696●「太近了，太近了啊…」

○007697○Her breath, her smell, her very presence―all of it was unreasonably close.
●007697●阳菜子桑的呼吸，味道，和存在，都离我相当的近。

○007698○My lack of vision made their feeling all the clearer.
●007698●因为眼睛看不见，使得感觉更加强烈。

○007699○...I was starting to feel kind of giddy.
●007699●…总感觉，有点晕晕乎乎的。

○007700○Matsushita
●007700●松下

○007701○"I, I need to head back."
●007701●「我，我该，该回去了」

○007702○I backed away, distancing myself from her.
●007702●我向后倒退，和阳菜子拉开了距离。

○007703○Hinako
●007703●阳菜子

○007704○"Waaaah..."
●007704●「呜诶诶诶—…」

○007705○More false tears, I was sure.
●007705●肯定，还是假的眼泪。

○007706○Matsushita
●007706●松下

○007707○"...Just a little bit longer."
●007707●「…只能一小会哦」

○007708○Hinako
●007708●阳菜子

○007709○"Hurray!"
●007709●「好耶！」

○007710○I heard her happy-sounding voice, and I felt her approach once more.
●007710●伴随着她高兴的声音，阳菜子桑又出现了靠近的迹象。

○007711○I squeezed my already unseeing eyes as tightly shut as I could and tried to breathe through my mouth.
●007711●我更加用力地闭上了看不见的眼睛，尽可能地用嘴呼吸，而不是用鼻子。

○007712○My heart was pounding.
●007712●心脏怦怦地跳个不停。

○007713○When I thought about how her lips might be right in front of mine, it felt like my heart was going to leap right up out of my mouth.
●007713●一想到阳菜子的嘴唇就在自己的眼前，感觉心脏都要从嘴里飞出来了。

○007714○I stood that way for so long, it felt like an eternity.
●007714●内心里经过了漫长的时间，仿佛是永远一样。

○007715○Hinako
●007715●阳菜子

○007716○"Hmmm... It kinda feels like your eyes look a lot like mine."
●007716●「嗯，感觉你的眼睛一定和我很像哦」

○007717○Hinako-san laughed as she felt around my tightly shut eyes.
●007717●阳菜子桑一边笑着，一边抚摸着我紧闭的眼圈周围。

○007718○Hinako
●007718●阳菜子

○007719○"We really are cousins, aren't we?"
●007719●「果然，我们是，堂姐弟呢」

○007720○Her voice was so bright and cheerful it almost felt like a let-down, and I could tell she was standing up.
●007720●她的声音明快爽朗得让人失望。我注意到阳菜子桑站了起来。

○007721○Matsushita
●007721●松下

○007722○"Cousins, huh...?"
●007722●「堂姐弟，吗…」

○007723○I couldn't tell if she heard me muttering.
●007723●我不知道她有没有听见我的嘀咕声。

○007724○But I really did need to go back soon.
●007724●但是，再不回去可不行了。

○007725○I couldn't let myself lose by default after failing to show up.
●007725●我可不能让自己因为没有回去，就这么不战而败。

○007726○Hinako
●007726●阳菜子

○007727○"Yeah. Sorry for making you tag along with me."
●007727●「嗯。抱歉呢，把你拉了出来」

○007728○Matsushita
●007728●松下

●007729●「…不，没关系的」

○007730○Hinako
●007730●阳菜子

○007731○"All right!"
●007731●「好！」

○007732○This time, she slapped me on the rear.
●007732●她这么说的同时，拍了拍我的屁股。

○007733○Matsushita
●007733●松下

○007734○"Ouch!"
●007734●「痛！」

○007735○Talk about an unexpectedly powerful way of cheering me on.
●007735●这种鼓励的方式还真是出乎意料的有力。

○007736○Hinako
●007736●阳菜子

○007737○"No moping, okay?"
●007737●「这么闷闷不乐的可不行哦」

○007738○Hinako
●007738●阳菜子

○007739○"You're a boy, aren't you?"
●007739●「你是男孩子吧」

○007740○I felt like a weight had been lifted from my shoulders.
●007740●感觉轻松了很多。

○007741○When I was lost, or worried, or depressed, I now had a sign to point the way for me.
●007741●迷茫的时候、烦恼的时候、失落的时候，都有了自己的指向标。

○007742○To show me the path I should walk to move onward.
●007742●有了前进的目标方向。

○007743○Matsushita
●007743●松下

○007744○"...Thank you, Hina-nee-chan."
●007744●「…谢谢你，阳菜姐」

○007745○Hinako
●007745●阳菜子

○007746○"For what?"
●007746●「为什么？」

○007747○She played dumb in response.

○007748○Matsushita
●007748●松下

●007749●「不，没什么」

○007750○Hinako
●007750●阳菜子

○007756○Hinako
●007756●阳菜子

○007758○Hinako
●007758●阳菜子

○008024○Matsushita
●008024●松下

●008025●「决赛的第二天，下起了大雨，前一天的天气就像是在说谎一样」

○008026○The very next day?
●008026●第二天？

○008027○I almost questioned that, but I held it in and kept listening.
●008027●诶？我本来想发出声音，但还是没插嘴，继续听着。

○008028○Matsushita
●008028●松下

○008029○"Even though it was the summer, it was a super cold, rainy day."
●008029●「明明是在夏天，却是一个非常冷的雨天」

○008030○Matsushita
●008030●松下

○008031○"I wanted to tell her that I'd won as soon as possible."
●008031●「我想尽快把昨天优胜的结果报告给她」

○008032○Matsushita
●008032●松下

○008033○"I wanted to say it was all thanks to her encouragement."
●008033●「我想说，自己多亏了阳菜子桑的努力才取胜了」

○008034○Matsushita
●008034●松下

○008035○"...But, the news came all too abruptly."
●008035●「…然而，这个消息，来的太突然了」

○008036○黒
●008036●黒

○008037○Matsushita
●008037●松下

○008038○"That morning, she'd left her house and headed for her workplace, just as usual."
●008038●「那天早上，她像往常一样出门去上班」

○008039○Matsushita
●008039●松下

○008040○"On the way there... she was hit by a runaway car. I was told she died instantly."
●008040●「就在路上…一辆失控的汽车撞上了她。据说是当场死亡」

○008041○A look of frustrated gloom passed across his face.
●008041●他的脸上掠过了一丝阴郁。

○008042○Matsushita
●008042●松下

○008043○"The driver had fallen asleep at the wheel after staying up all night drinking. The weather was bad, on top of it. Of course he didn't see her walking along with her white cane."
●008043●「司机喝酒喝到了凌晨，打着瞌睡开车。而且天气也不好。理所当然地，看不到拄着白杖的她吧」

○008044○Matsushita
●008044●松下

○008045○"It was all the people in the vicinity could do to save themselves. They didn't have the leeway to worry about others."
●008045●「周围的人，全都为了保护自己而竭尽全力，根本无暇去顾及他人」

○008046○Matsushita
●008046●松下

○008047○"Her funeral was oppressively silent..."
●008047●「她的葬礼，太安静了…」

○008048○Matsushita
●008048●松下

○008049○"Hinako-san was still so young, and everyone looked up to her. Her service was drowned in grief."
●008049●「阳菜子桑年龄很轻，又很受人爱戴。她的葬礼被悲伤淹没了」

○008050○Matsushita
●008050●松下

○008051○"None of it felt real to me. Everything that went on around me felt like it was happening to someone else."
●008051●「太没有真实感了。周围发生的一切，似乎都像是别人的事情一样」

○008052○Matsushita
●008052●松下

○008053○"It was like I was isolated from the rest of the world, cut off by a single curtain. It was the same thing I'd felt right after I lost my vision."
●008053●「感觉自己和世界之间，像是被一条布帘分隔开了一样。这种感觉，和刚刚失明的时候一样」

○008054○Matsushita
●008054●松下

○008055○"Back then Hinako-san had saved me, but now she was gone. I couldn't accept that truth."
●008055●「那时把我救出来的阳菜子桑已经不在了。这一事实令人难以相信」

○008056○Matsushita
●008056●松下

○008057○"We said our last goodbyes to Hinako-san as she lay there in her coffin."
●008057●「我们向沉睡在棺材中的阳菜子桑做了最后的告别」

○008058○Matsushita
●008058●松下

●008059●「母亲对我说，『看着她的脸』」

●008115●诶？我本来想发出声音，但还是没插嘴，继续听着。

○008116○Matsushita
●008116●松下

○008117○"Even though it was the summer, it was quite the cold, rainy day."
●008117●「明明是在夏天，却是一个非常冷的雨天」

○008118○Matsushita
●008118●松下

○008119○"I wanted to tell her about my victory as soon as possible."
●008119●「我想尽快把昨天优胜的结果报告给她」

○008120○Matsushita
●008120●松下

○008121○"I wanted to say it was all thanks to her encouragement."
●008121●「我想说，自己多亏阳菜子桑的努力才取胜了」

○008122○Matsushita
●008122●松下

○008123○"...But, the news came all too abruptly."
●008123●「…然而，这个消息，来的太突然了」

○008124○黒
●008124●黒

○008125○Matsushita
●008125●松下

○008126○"That morning, she'd left her house and headed for her workplace, just as usual."
●008126●「那天早上，她像往常一样出门去上班」

○008127○Matsushita
●008127●松下

○008128○"On the way there... she was hit by a runaway car. I was told she died instantly."
●008128●「就在路上…一辆失控的汽车撞上了她。据说是当场死亡」

○008129○A look of frustrated gloom passed across his face.
●008129●他的脸上掠过了一丝阴郁。

○008130○Matsushita
●008130●松下

○008131○"The driver had fallen asleep at the wheel after staying up all night drinking. The weather was bad, on top of it. Of course he didn't see her walking along with her white cane."
●008131●「司机喝酒喝到了凌晨，打着瞌睡开车。而且天气也不好。理所当然地，看不到拄着白杖的她」

○008132○Matsushita
●008132●松下

○008133○"It was all the people in the vicinity could do to save themselves. They didn't have the leeway to worry about others."
●008133●「周围的人，全都为了保护自己而竭尽全力，根本无暇顾及他人」

○008134○Matsushita
●008134●松下

○008135○"Her funeral was oppressively silent..."
●008135●「她的葬礼，太安静了…」

○008136○Matsushita
●008136●松下

○008137○"Hinako-san was still so young, and everyone looked up to her. Her service was drowned in grief."
●008137●「阳菜子桑年龄很轻，又很受人爱戴。她的葬礼被悲伤淹没了」

○008138○Matsushita
●008138●松下

○008139○"None of it felt real to me. Everything that went on around me felt like it was happening to someone else."
●008139●「太没有真实感了。周围发生的一切，似乎都像是别人的事情一样」

○008140○Matsushita
●008140●松下

○008141○"It was like I was isolated from the rest of the world, cut off by a single curtain. It was the same thing I'd felt right after I lost my vision."
●008141●「感觉自己和世界之间，像被一条布帘分隔开了一样。这种感觉，和刚刚失明的时候一样」

○008142○Matsushita
●008142●松下

○008143○"Back then Hinako-san had saved me, but now she was gone. I couldn't accept that truth."
●008143●「那时把我救出来的阳菜子桑已经不在了。这一事实令人难以相信」

○008144○Matsushita
●008144●松下

○008145○"We said our last goodbyes to Hinako-san as she lay there in her coffin."
●008145●「我们向沉睡在棺材中的阳菜子桑做了最后的告别」

○008146○Matsushita
●008146●松下

○008147○"My mother told me to 'look at her face.'"
●008147●「母亲对我说，『看着她的脸』」

○008148○Matsushita
●008148●松下

○008149○"I imagine she hadn't really thought about what she was saying."
●008149●「她应该是在无意间说出这句话的吧」

○008150○Matsushita
●008150●松下

○008151○"I brought my face closer to hers, just as I was told."
●008151●「我按她所说的，把脸靠近了上去」

○008152○Matsushita
●008152●松下

○008153○"........."
●008153●「………」

○008154○Matsushita
●008154●松下

○008155○"...And I felt nothing."
●008155●「…什么感觉都没有」

○008156○nothing
●008156●nothing

○008159○nothing
●008159●nothing

○008160○Matsushita
●008160●松下

○008161○"Hinako-san's presence, her sun-like warmth... there wasn't the slightest trace of it."
●008161●「像太阳一样温暖的阳菜子桑的气息，一点都感觉不到」

○008162○Matsushita
●008162●松下

○008163○"The kind, gentle scent I'd smelled right before the finals... was nowhere to be found."
●008163●「她在那场决赛之前，散发出的温柔的香气，已经哪里都找不到了」

○008164○Matsushita
●008164●松下

○008165○"'I won! It's all thanks to you, Hina-nee-chan!'"
●008165●「『我赢了！多亏了阳菜姐啊！』」

○008166○Matsushita
●008166●松下

○008167○"I told her, but she didn't reply."
●008167●「我这么对她说，但她却没有回应」

○008168○Matsushita
●008168●松下

○008169○"She was just so, so cold."
●008169●「她只是，很冷」

○008170○Matsushita
●008170●松下

○008171○"The Hina-nee-chan who would smile when she heard my report was no longer there."
●008171●「会笑着听我报告的那个阳菜姐，已经不在那里了」

○008172○Matsushita
●008172●松下

○008173○"Her body was right there, she should've been right in front of me, but nothing I said could get through to her."
●008173●「她的身体，明明就离我这么近，却什么都传达不到」

○008174○Matsushita
●008174●松下

○008175○"My mother stood next to me, sobbing."
●008175●「母亲在旁边抽泣着」

○008176○Matsushita
●008176●松下

○008177○"In spite of the tragic accident, her face was miraculously undamaged. I learned that after the fact."
●008177●「后来听说，虽然事故相当悲惨，但她的脸却如同奇迹般，几乎没有损伤」

○008178○Matsushita
●008178●松下

○008179○"It was the tiniest bit of comfort."
●008179●「算是一点点的安慰」

○008180○黒
●008180●黒

○008181○Matsushita
●008181●松下

○008182○"I'd always lived in pitch darkness."
●008182●「我，一直处在黑暗之中」

○008183○Matsushita
●008183●松下

○008184○"I cursed the world that stole Hinako-san from me."
●008184●「我憎恶这个夺走了阳菜子桑的世界」

○008185○Matsushita
●008185●松下

○008186○"She was like the sun to me."
●008186●「她对我来说，就像是太阳一样的人」

○008187○Matsushita
●008187●松下

○008188○"That world stole my light away from me twice."
●008188●「世界从我的手中，夺走了两次光明」

○008189○Matsushita
●008189●松下

●008190●「第一次，是视力…」

○008191○Matsushita

●008333●也就是说…护騨的故事还没有结束。

○008336○Matsushita
●008336●松下

○008337○"When I came to this world and opened my eyes for the first time, I was bewildered."

○008338○Matsushita
●008338●松下

○008339○"...Anyone'd be surprised, of course. But my case was a bit different, y'know?"
●008339●「…当然，换谁都会吃惊的。但我的情况，有些不同哦」

○008340○Matsushita
●008340●松下

○008341○"I could see. That was bewildering in and of itself. I couldn't believe that it was real for a while."
●008341●「我的眼睛看得见。这件事本身就很困惑。我一时难以接受这个事实」

○008342○Matsushita
●008342●松下

○008343○"Weird, right? Back when I lost my vision, I couldn't believe it for some time..."
●008343●「很奇怪吧。在我变得看不见的时候，我一时间无法相信」

○008344○Matsushita
●008344●松下

○008345○"...But this time, I couldn't believe I could see."
●008345●「这次，则不相信自己看得见」

○008346○Matsushita
●008346●松下

○008347○"At first, everything I could see was blindingly bright, y'know?"
●008347●「最开始，眼睛看到的所有东西都很耀眼哦？」

○008348○Matsushita
●008348●松下

○008349○"I felt a prickling sort of pain in my eyes, and just opening them was rough."
●008349●「眼睛有一种刺痛感，光是睁着就很不容易了」

○008350○Matsushita
●008350●松下

○008351○"But before I knew it, I was used to it."
●008351●「但马上就习惯了」

○008352○Matsushita
●008352●松下

○008353○"Once my eyes adjusted to the light, the next thing to surprise me was... well, everything."
●008353●「眼睛适应了光线之后，接下来让我感到吃惊的，是看到的一切」

○008354○Matsushita
●008354●松下

○008355○"...The last time I'd seen anything was in early elementary school."
●008355●「…上次看到东西，还是小学低年级的时候」

○008356○Matsushita
●008356●松下

○008357○"So, to be honest, even people's faces looked weird to me, at first."
●008357●「所以，说实话，一开始连人的脸都感觉奇怪」

○008358○Matsushita
●008358●松下

●008359●「『人』是这个样子吗？」

○008360○Matsushita
●008360●松下

○008361○"Everything felt kinda off like that."
●008361●「就是这样的违和感」

●008656●松下

●008660●松下

○008662○Matsushita
●008662●松下

○008663○"...Anyone would be surprised, of course. But my case was a little bit different."
●008663●「…当然，换谁都会吃惊的。但我的情况，有些不同」

○008664○Matsushita
●008664●松下

●008665●「我的眼睛看得见。这件事本身就很困惑。我一时难以接受这个事实」

○008666○Matsushita
●008666●松下

●008667●「很奇怪吧。在我变得看不见的时候，我有段时间内无法相信」

●008674●松下

○008678○Matsushita
●008678●松下

●008680●松下

●009128●松下

○009129○"I'll teach you what's really scary about not being able to see."
●009129●「我会告诉你眼睛看不见的真正可怕之处」

○009130○With that, the conversation finally came full circle.
●009130●到这里，对话终于回到了开始。

○009131○I was sure that this was what Godan had really wanted to tell me this whole time.
●009131●这才是护騨真正想要传达的东西。

○009132○Matsushita
●009132●松下

○009133○"See, I forgot all that stuff."
●009133●「那就是，我在忘记」

○009134○Matsushita
●009134●松下

○009135○"All the things I was sure I used to know: people's faces, scenery, colors..."
●009135●「以前应该记得的，人的脸，风景，还有颜色…」

○009136○Matsushita
●009136●松下

○009137○"The longer I went without seeing them, the fainter they got, fading away until finally I couldn't remember them at all."
●009137●「眼睛看不到的时间越长，记忆就变得越模糊，变得越淡薄，最终就想不起来了」

○009138○Godan let out a long, deep breath.
●009138●护騨深深地叹了口气。

○009139○Matsushita
●009139●松下

○009140○"...For instance, Otonashi. How would you explain 'blue' to someone who can't see?"
●009140●「…举个例子，音无。你会怎么向眼睛看不见的人解释『蓝色』？」

○009141○Matsushita
●009141●松下

○009142○"I'll teach you what's really scary about not being able to see."
