○009334○However, Godan shook his head sadly.
●009334●然而，护騨露出了悲伤的目光，摇了摇头。

○009335○Matsushita
●009335●松下

○009336○"Back then... I never looked at her face."
●009336●「那个时候的我…从没有看到她的脸」

○009337○Matsushita
●009337●松下

○009338○"I mean, I looked at it, but I never thought to take note of it."
●009338●「不，看是看到了，但从没有想过去记住」

○009339○Matsushita
●009339●松下

○009340○"Back then, I only saw Hinako-san as a troublesome, or even obnoxious relative."
●009340●「对当时的我来说，阳菜子桑不过是个麻烦的，甚至让人讨厌的亲戚而已」

○009341○...He did mention that, it's true.
●009341●…确实，他有提到过。

○009342○Matsushita
●009342●松下

○009343○"Kinda embarrassed to admit it, though."
●009343●「虽然说起来很羞耻」

○009344○Matsushita
●009344●松下

○009345○"That's why when I eventually thought to remember her face, I realized I couldn't bring it to mind at all..."
●009345●「所以，当我试图回忆起来的时候，发现自己完全不记得她的脸…」

○009346○Matsushita
●009346●松下

○009347○"...I was devastated."
●009347●「…我愕然了」

○009348○Matsushita
●009348●松下

○009349○"She was the most important person for me, the person I looked up to above all others, the person who was always there for me, but still..."
●009349●「她明明是我最重要的人，最憧憬的人，是一直在我身边的人…」

○009350○Matsushita
●009350●松下

○009351○"I couldn't remember her face."
●009351●「然而我不记得她的脸」

○009352○Matsushita
●009352●松下

○009353○"If my vision had never returned, I doubt it'd have bothered me as much."
●009353●「干脆，让眼睛一直看不见的话，就不会去在意这件事了吧」

○009354○Matsushita
●009354●松下

○009355○"But, I can see now."
●009355●「然而，我现在能看见了」

○009356○Matsushita
●009356●松下

○009357○"There are so many things I could never possibly feel though touch, hearing, and smell alone. A colossal amount of information; enough to overwhelm me."
●009357●「仅凭触感，听觉和气味无法感知的超大量压倒级信息，让我不知所措」

○009358○Matsushita
●009358●松下

○009359○"It was enough to numb all my other senses."
●009359●「已经到了让其他的感觉麻痹的程度」

○009360○Matsushita
●009360●松下

○009361○"Even now, I can still more or less remember the sound of Hinako-san's voice, the way Hinako-san smelled, the warmth of Hinako-san's hands..."
●009361●「即使现在，我依然记得阳菜子桑的声音，阳菜子桑的气味，阳菜子桑手上的温暖…」

○009362○Matsushita
●009362●松下

○009363○"By forcing myself to keep them in mind, I've barely managed to cling onto those memories."
●009363●「只有靠着拼命回忆，才能够勉强地维持」

○009364○Matsushita
●009364●松下

○009365○"...But in this world where I can see again, it feels like someday, I'll forget them."
●009365●「…然而，在这个眼睛能够看见的世界里，感觉很快就会忘记」

○009366○Matsushita
●009366●松下

○009367○"And in that sense alone, the ability to see is incredible... and yet, terrifying."
●009367●「正因为如此，能看见的眼睛很厉害…并且，很恐怖」

○009368○Matsushita
●009368●松下

○009369○"Yes, that's right."
●009369●「唔姆，没错」

○009370○Matsushita
●009370●松下

○009371○"You can't touch or hear 'blue,' so there's no way for a blind person to understand it."
●009371●「盲人是不可能理解既摸不到，也听不着的『蓝色』的」

○009372○Matsushita
●009372●松下

○009373○"Or at the very least, it was impossible for me."
●009373●「至少，对我来说做不到」

○009374○Matsushita
●009374●松下

○009375○"Hinako-san's face was the same way."
●009375●「阳菜子桑的脸，也是一样的」

●009398●「…但是，护騨的眼睛在小时候还能看见的吧？」

○009399○Otonashi
●009399●音无

○009400○Damn Brat
●009400●祖安带师

○009401○Proxy
●009401●代理人

○009418○Dung Beetle
●009418●屎壳郎

○009419○Consumer Model Hinata
●009419●量产型日向

○009420○??
●009420●？？

○009421○"In that case, couldn't some part of you still remember it?"
●009421●「那么，应该还记得的吧？」

○009422○However, Godan shook his head sadly.
●009422●然而，护騨露出了悲伤的目光，摇了摇头。

○009423○Matsushita
●009423●松下

○009424○"Back then... I never looked at her face."
●009424●「那个时候的我…从没有看到过她的脸」

○009425○Matsushita
●009425●松下

○009426○"Or rather, I looked at it, but I never thought to take note of it."
●009426●「不，看是看到了，但从没有想过去记住」

○009427○Matsushita
●009427●松下

○009428○"Back then, I only saw Hinako-san as a troublesome, or even obnoxious relative."
●009428●「对当时的我来说，阳菜子桑不过是个麻烦的，甚至让人讨厌的亲戚而已」

○009429○...He did mention that, it's true.
●009429●…确实，他有提到过。

○009430○Matsushita
●009430●松下

○009431○"Embarrassing as it is to admit it."
●009431●「虽然说起来很羞耻」

○009432○Matsushita
●009432●松下

○009433○"That's why when I eventually thought to remember her face, I realized I couldn't bring it to mind at all..."
●009433●「所以，当我试图回忆起来的时候，发现自己完全不记得她的脸…」

○009434○Matsushita
●009434●松下

○009435○"...I was devastated."
●009435●「…我愕然了」

○009436○Matsushita
●009436●松下

○009437○"She was the most important person for me, the person I looked up to above all others, the person who was always there for me, and yet..."
●009437●「她明明是我最重要的人，最憧憬的人，一直在我身边的人…」

○009438○Matsushita
●009438●松下

○009439○"I couldn't remember her face."
●009439●「然而我不记得她的脸」

○009440○Matsushita
●009440●松下

○009441○"If my vision had never returned, I imagine it wouldn't have bothered me as much."
●009441●「干脆，让眼睛一直看不见的话，就不会去在意这件事了吧」

○009442○Matsushita
●009442●松下

○009443○"But, I can see now."
●009443●「然而，我现在能看见了」

○009444○Matsushita
●009444●松下

○009445○"There are so many things I could never possibly feel though touch, hearing, and smell alone. A colossal amount of information; enough to overwhelm me."
●009445●「仅凭触感，听觉和气味无法感知的超大量压倒级信息，让我不知所措」

○009446○Matsushita
●009446●松下

○009447○"It was enough to numb all my other senses."
●009447●「已经到了使其他的感觉麻痹的程度」

○009448○Matsushita
●009448●松下

○009449○"Even now, I can still more or less remember the sound of Hinako-san's voice, the way Hinako-san smelled, the warmth of Hinako-san's hands..."
●009449●「即使现在，我依然记得阳菜子桑的声音，阳菜子桑的气味，阳菜子桑手上的温暖…」

○009450○Matsushita
●009450●松下

○009451○"By forcing myself to keep them in mind, I've barely managed to cling onto those memories."
●009451●「只有靠着拼命回忆，才能够勉强地维持」

○009452○Matsushita
●009452●松下

○009453○"...But in this world where I can see again, it feels like someday, I'll forget them."
●009453●「…然而，在这个眼睛能够看见的世界里，感觉很快就会忘记」

○009454○Matsushita
●009454●松下

○009455○"And in that sense alone, the ability to see is incredible... and yet, terrifying."
●009455●「正因为如此，能看见的眼睛很厉害…并且，很恐怖」

○009456○I pondered his situation.
●009456●我对此陷入了沉思。

○009457○It would seem that not being able to remember her face was the only reason Godan still remained in this world.
●009457●想不起她的脸，是护騨留在这里的唯一理由。

○009458○Would the flow of time, the only thing that ever changed in this world, grant him that wish, in the end...?
●009458●在这个只有时间流逝的世界里，真的能够让他实现吗…。

○009459○Godan's tall, lithe body looked like it was trembling to me.
●009459●护騨高大的身体，看起来像是在颤抖。

○009460○Godan's massive body looked like it was trembling to me.
●009460●护騨巨大的身体，看起来像是在颤抖。

○009461○Almost like a child, terrified of a ghost or something.
●009461●简直就像是害怕幽灵的孩子一样。

○009462○Before I could ask what he was so scared of, he began to speak once more.
●009462●还没等我我问他在害怕什么，护騨就已经开口了。

○009463○Matsushita
●009463●松下

○009464○"...I've gotta remember Hinako-san."
●009464●「…我必须要想起阳菜子桑」

○009465○Matsushita
●009465●松下

○009466○"I know I saw her face when I was young, and I wanna remember it."
●009466●「我想要回忆起她的脸，在小时候确实地见过的脸」

○009467○Matsushita
●009467●松下

○009468○"Hey, Otonashi."
●009468●「那个，音无」

○009469○Godan turned to face me, a smile cracking through his grief-stricken expression.
●009469●护騨面向着我，哭泣的表情中露出了微笑。

○009470○Matsushita
●009470●松下

○009471○"...Do you remember what I told you, right after you showed up in this world?"
●009471●「…你还记得刚刚来到这个世界的时候，我对你说过的话吗？」

○009472○Matsushita
●009472●松下

○009473○"...I have to remember Hinako-san."
●009473●「…我，必须要想起阳菜子桑」

○009474○Matsushita
●009474●松下

○009475○"I know I saw her face when I was young, and I want to remember it."
●009475●「我想回忆起她的脸，在小时候确实地见过的脸」

○009476○Matsushita
●009476●松下

○009477○"Hey, Otonashi."
●009477●「那个，音无」

○009478○Godan turned to face me, a smile cracking through his grief-stricken expression.
●009478●护騨面向着我，哭泣的表情中露出了微笑。

○009479○Matsushita
●009479●松下

●009480●「…你还记得刚刚来到这个世界的时候，我对你说过的话吗？」

○009504○I cast my mind back as I spoke.

○009505○What had Godan told me?
●009505●护騨说过的话？

●009507●松下

○014911○"The flowerbeds? Aaah, so you can take care of your gardening work?"

○014912○It was part of Kanade's daily routine.
●014912●奏的日常事务。

○014913○Wearing a straw hat on the hotter days, she'd handle all the watering, fertilizing and weeding in both the flowerbeds and the greenhouses that stood next to them.
●014913●在大热天戴上草帽，给大棚和花坛里的花浇水，施肥，除草。

○014914○We'd seen her working there countless times before.
●014914●我们在此之前，就已经多次看到她工作的身影了。

○014915○When we arrived at the flowerbeds, Kanade immediately got to work weeding.
●014915●奏到了花坛之后，立刻就开始除起了草。

○014916○I looked out over the multicolored flowers that were blooming all over.
●014916●我眺望着五颜六色的花朵。

○016176○The flowerbeds were located in a pretty high place in the massive school grounds.
●016176●花坛在周围广阔的土地之上，处于一个相当高的位置。

●016177●稍微往下俯视，就能看到图书馆和网球场，再往下则是足球场和棒球场。

○016178○At that moment, the sun began to set.
●016178●这时，太阳开始落山了。

○016179○Its light dyed the scene in front of me a gentle orange color.
●016179●温和的橙色光芒，尽染着眼前的景色。

○016180○Bathed in the glow of the evening sun, I could almost mistake the sky for a sea of vermilion. 
●016180●眼前的视野，沐浴在夕阳的反照之下，让人误以为是朱红色的大海一般。

○016181○And then―
●016181●然后──。

○016182○Suddenly.
●016182●不意之间。

○016183○Abruptly.
●016183●突然之间。

○016184○Unexpectedly.
●016184●唐突之间。

○016185○Without even the slightest hint of warning.
●016185●完全，没有任何预兆。

○016186○I had a vision.
●016186●我，幻视了。

○016187○se_breeze_loop
●016187●se_breeze_loop

○016188○nothing
●016188●nothing

○016191○nothing
●016191●nothing

○016192○A field of sunflowers in full bloom, spreading out to the horizon all around me.
●016192●视野里满是盛开的向日葵。

○016193○se_breeze
●016193●se_breeze

○016194○Their brilliant golden petals swaying in the wind like waves in the ocean.
●016194●闪耀着金黄色光辉的花朵，像是波浪一样，在风中摇曳着。

○016195○The countless blossoms were spread wide open, stretching up towards the blue sky above.
●016195●无数盛开的大朵鲜花，向着蓝天伸展着。

○016196○And there, shining far above that ocean of sunflowers―the sun.
●016196●向日葵的海洋延伸着，延伸到了在天空闪耀着光辉的——太阳。

○016197○The ever-brilliant, ever-dazzling summer sun, bathing the world in its light from on high.
●016197●夏日的阳光，自天顶而下，照耀着世界，眩目而耀眼。

○017040○Looking out once more, it was a really wide space.

○017041○With the greenhouses cleared away and most of the plants gone, the vacant space felt huge. Just how long is it going to take the two of us to deal with all of it?
●017041●大棚不见了，大部分的花也不见了，空地变得相当宽敞了。不过，在这之后，两个人一起干的话，要经过多长时间才能完成呢？

○017042○Regardless of how long it'd take, though, we had to see it though.
●017042●但就算再久，我们也还是要完成。

○017043○We'll turn this vacant plot that Kanade created for us into a sea of sunflowers.
●017043●这片空地，是奏创造出来的。这片空地，将会变成向日葵的海洋。

○017044○We'll bury the whole lot in golden blossoms.
●017044●金黄色的花朵，将会掩埋这整个地方。

○017045○Godan told me.
●017045●护騨说过。

○017046○He said that Hinako-san was like the sun itself.
●017046●阳菜子同学，就像是太阳一样。

○017047○nothing
●017047●nothing

○017050○nothing
●017050●nothing

○017051○In that case, I just have to show it to him.

○017052○To show him the sun.
●017052●看到那个太阳。

○017053○There's a sun in this world too, of course.
●017053●这个世界上，当然也有太阳。

○017054○Just like when we were alive, it rises in the east and sets in the west.
●017054●和我们活着的时候一样，自东方升起，向西方落下。

○017055○However, it wasn't the same sun we knew when we were alive.
●017055●然而，这并不是我们生前的那个，同一个太阳。

○017056○This whole world is nothing more than a replica, put together by God.
●017056●这整个世界，都只是神创造的复制品。

○017057○So in that case, where was the sun from our lifetimes? In other words, the sun Godan compared Hinako-san to?
●017057●那么，我们生前的太阳，也就是护騨用来形容阳菜子同学的太阳，在哪里呢？

○017058○I didn't know.
●017058●我不知道。

○017059○There was no way I could know.
●017059●我不可能知道。

○017060○I mean, obviously.
●017060●这是理所当然的。

○017061○There was no way for us to know the state of things in the living world.
●017061●生前世界的状况，我们无从知晓。

○017062○But I thought, just maybe, the sunflowers would know.
●017062●但是，也许——如果是向日葵的话，应该能知道。

○017063○The sunflowers, that bloom towards the sun itself.
●017063●如果是向着太阳盛开的向日葵的话。

○019492○With those words, he left the room.

○019493○Seriously, what was that about?
●019493●真的，到底怎么回事啊？

○019494○But on the other hand, getting a glimpse of Otonashi's real intentions certainly made me a bit happy.
●019494●但是，能够窥探到音无的真实意图，确实让我有点高兴。

○019495○It might be that he came here to get them through to me.
●019495●说不定，他就是来传达这一点的吧。

○019496○Otonashi's gang's strange behavior continued.
●019496●在这之后，音无他们的奇怪行为还在继续着。

○019497○Sometimes they'd cut me off, sometimes they'd guide me to a totally different destination, and sometimes they kept me from looking in a particular direction.
●019497●有时会阻挡住我的去路，有时会把我引向不同的目的地，有时会转移我的注意力。

○019498○Matsushita
●019498●松下

○019499○"...No way I wouldn't catch on, right?"
●019499●「…我不可能看不出来的吧」

○019500○Matsushita
●019500●松下

○019501○"...There's no way I wouldn't catch on, right?"
●019501●「…不可能看不出来的吧」

○019502○It was only natural to get suspicious after this many repeated, brazen incidents.
●019502●重复了这么多次的露骨行为，当然会引人生疑。

○019503○However, I chose to let myself be deceived.
●019503●然而，我还是决定被骗。

○019504○I'd be lying if I said it didn't bother me a bit, but I decided to believe in Otonashi.
●019504●要说不在意的话，肯定是骗人的，但我还是决定相信音无。

○019505○He asked me not to ask questions and I agreed, after all.
●019505●毕竟他说过，什么都不要问，而我也同意了。

○019506○And so the seasons of this world moved along and the pleasant weather of May passed by. The rainy season marked the beginning of summer.
●019506●就这样，这个世界的季节，经过了阳光的五月之后，迎来了梅雨季节，夏天开始了。

○019507○At the end of July, summer vacation began.
●019507●七月底，学校放暑假了。

○019508○Even in the afterlife, the school gave us a long vacation then.
●019508●就算在这死后世界的学校，也是有长假的。

○019509○Most likely, it was to make this place feel as authentically similar to schools in the living world as possible.
●019509●大概，是为了让人尽可能地过上和生前的世界一样的校园生活吧。

○019510○Even after summer vacation began, though, my daily life didn't change much.
●019510●即使到了暑假，日常生活也没有什么变化。

○019511○There hadn't been any battles recently, but I still kept up with my conditioning. It was like a daily routine I'd carried over from when I was alive.
●019511●虽然没有战斗，但身体的锻炼还是在继续。如同从生前就开始的日常必修课一般。

○019512○nothing
●019512●nothing

○019515○nothing
●019515●nothing

○019516○Looking up at the sky, the sun shone brilliantly above me.
●019516●抬头仰望天空，太阳十分耀眼。

○019517○The golden light of the summer sun was something you couldn't see in any other season.
●019517●金黄色的光芒，在其他的季节可是看不到的。

○019518○I'd forgotten that, when I was alive.
●019518●我在活着的时候，就已经忘记了。

○019519○Even without seeing the sun, summer was as hot as ever.
●019519●就算看不见太阳，夏天也依然炎热。

○019520○Even without my vision, I could still feel that heat.
●019520●就算看不到，也能够感觉到。

○019521○Hinako-san had taught me that.
●019521●这是阳菜子桑所教给我的。

○019522○But, how did that really turn out?
●019522●然而，实际情况呢？

○019523○Over the course of those long years without my vision, I forgot Hinako-san's face.
●019523●我在这看不见的漫长时光里，忘记了阳菜子桑的脸。

○019524○...I wanted to see her, just once more.
●019524●…我想再看到她的脸，一次就好。

○019525○That was my wish.
●019525●这就是，我的愿望。

○019526○My pace slowed unconsciously, and my workout came to a halt.
●019526●正在进行肌肉锻炼的手，自然地停了下来。

○019527○I'm sure I'll be here in this world forever, if I can't remember her face.
●019527●只要我不回忆起她的脸，就会一直留在这个世界上吧。

○019528○Without a reason, point, or goal to accomplish.
●019528●没有意义，没有理由，没有目的。

○020332○It was obvious, but each one was different from the rest.
●020332●虽然是理所当然的事情，但每一朵都各不相同。

○020333○And when all of those differing flowers came together, they formed a whole that looked as massive as an ocean.
●020333●一朵朵各不相同的花聚在一起，汇成了巨大的海洋。

○020334○An ocean, massive waves rolling across its surface.
●020334●波涛汹涌，动荡起伏的大海。

○020798○I was sure he'd see the sun and Hinako-san if he looked out in the direction the flowers faced.
●020798●在向日葵所朝向的方向，一定能够看到太阳，还有阳菜子同学。

○020799○That was the meaning behind this sunflower field that I thought up and the five of us made together.
●020799●这就是我所构想的，以及五个人一起建起的向日葵花田的意义。

○020800○That was the meaning behind this sunflower field that I thought up and the four of us made together.
●020800●这就是我所构想的，以及四个人一起建起的向日葵花田的意义。

○020801○This was the only way we who had never seen Hinako-san's face could show it to him.
●020801●对于不认识阳菜子同学的我们而言，这是我们能让护騨看到的，唯一的东西。

○020802○The sun that rises and sets in the living world.
●020802●那就是，在生前的世界升起的太阳。

○020803○These sunflowers would be the compass that pointed our way to it.
●020803●这些向日葵，则是指明方向的指南针。

○020804○I waited―no, we all waited―for Godan's answer with bated breath.
●020804●我，不，不仅是我，大家都屏住了呼吸，等待着护騨的回答。

○020805○...And after a brief silence.
●020805●…短暂的沉默之后。

○020806○Matsushita
●020806●松下

○020807○"Ha ha ha! For real, this is just... ha ha! Aaah, ha ha ha!"
●020807●「哈哈哈！不，这可真是…哈哈！啊哈哈哈！」

○020808○Godan burst out in a fit of booming laughter.
●020808●护騨大笑了起来。

○020809○We were all taken aback.
●020809●所有人全都呆住了。

○020810○Matsushita
●020810●松下

○020811○"I get it, I get it now, so that's how it is. I give up, this one's your win!"
●020811●「原来如此，原来如此啊，原来是这么回事啊。我服输，算我服输哦！」

○020812○Matsushita kept laughing, looking absolutely delighted.
●020812●护騨笑得合不拢嘴，看起来相当的愉悦。

○020813○Matsushita
●020813●松下

○020814○"Really, you've outdone me, y'know, Otonashi?"
●020814●「真的，我真的服输了哦，音无？」

○020815○After laughing for quite some time, his expression took a more serious turn.
●020815●他笑了一阵子之后，忽然变成了认真的表情。

○020816○Matsushita
●020816●松下

○020818○He declared.
●020818●他这么说道。

●021353●关于这个世界所处的位置，不管怎么深入思考，都是毫无意义的问题吧。

○021354○I could certainly understand why someone would question it.
●021354●对此有所疑问，也确实能够理解。

●021355●但是，因为这种不可能得到答案的问题而陷入烦恼，根本毫无意义。

○021486○Standing next to the countless blooming sunflowers, he faced the same direction as they did.

○021595○I thought that if I did that, it would satisfy them, too.
●021595●那样，他们也会得到满足的吧。

○021596○So I looked up to the sky.
●021596●所以，我抬头仰望了天空。

○021597○A myriad of sunflowers stood beside me.
●021597●我的身旁，是许许多多的向日葵。

○021598○The sun's rays beat down on me from somewhere off to the right.
●021598●太阳从我的右侧撒下了阳光。

○021599○Okay, I'm in a fix now.
●021599●好，麻烦来了。

○021600○I can't see a thing.
●021600●什么都看不见。

○021601○All I could see before me was an overwhelmingly blue summer sky, spreading out in all directions.
●021601●眼前能看见的，只有无边无际的，夏日的蓝天。

○021602○No matter how long I stared at it, nothing would change whatsoever.
●021602●不管看多久，都不会发生任何改变。

○021603○Matsushita
●021603●松下

○021604○"………"
●021604●「………」

○021606○I can't see anything.
●021606●什么都看不到。

○021607○All I could see before me was an overwhelmingly blue summer sky, spreading out in all directions.
●021607●眼前能看见的，只有无边无际的，夏日的蓝天。

○021608○No matter how long I stared at it, nothing would change whatsoever.
●021608●不管看多久，都不会发生任何改变。

○021609○Matsushita
●021609●松下

○021610○"........"
●021610●「………」

○021611○On a whim, I closed my eyes.
●021611●我突然起兴，闭上了眼睛。

○021612○Perhaps I thought that it wouldn't make any difference whether or not I was really looking.
●021612●可能是因为觉得，不管看还是不看，都没什么区别吧。

○021613○Or maybe my eyes were just tired from staring into the sky.
●021613●也可能单纯是因为仰望天空所导致的疲劳。

○021614○In any case, I closed them.
●021614●总之，我闭上了眼睛。

○021615○My vision went dark.
●021615●视野变暗了。

○021616○It wasn't a perfect, absolute blackness, like what I used to live in.
●021616●并不是像以前那样，完全的黑暗。

○021617○Some amount of light still filtered through my closed eyelids.
●021617●透过紧闭的眼皮，依然能感受到光的刺激。

○021618○I slightly spread my arms, perked up my ears, and took a deep breath.
●021618●我轻轻地张开了双手，放在耳边倾听，深吸了一口气。

○021619○se_breeze_loop
●021619●se_breeze_loop

○021620○First was the wind.
●021620●首先是风。

○021621○I felt it flow around me through the humid summer air.
●021621●在夏天的潮湿空气中，也能够感受到它的流动。

○021622○The slight breeze whisked away the sweat dampening my skin, stealing my body heat and causing me to feel a slight chill.
●021622●微风吹过我汗涔涔的额头，夺走了我的体温，让我感到了一丝凉意。

○021623○se_breeze
●021623●se_breeze

○021624○Next was the sound.
●021624●然后是声音。

○021625○The sunflowers made a faint rustling noise as they swayed in the wind.
●021625●向日葵在空中摇曳着，发出了轻微的沙沙声。

○021626○The pleasant sound of their leaves reached my ears.
●021626●树叶摩擦的声音传入耳中，让人感到悦耳。

○021627○Farther away, a presence.
●021627●远处的气息。

○021628○I could sense the breathing of Otonashi, Tachibana, Hinata, Naoi, and Yui as well, standing a ways away from me.
●021628●我能够感受到，站在稍远处的，音无和立华、日向和直井，还有由依的呼吸。

○021629○I could sense the breathing of Otonashi, Tachibana, Hinata, and Naoi as well, standing a ways away from me.
●021629●我能够感受到，站在稍远处的，音无和立华、日向和直井的呼吸。

○021630○I don't wanna let all the consideration you've shown me be for nothing.
●021630●我可不想让你们的关心白白浪费。

○021631○On top of that, the temperature.
●021631●还有温度。

○021632○The summer sun bathed the right side of my face in light, heating it up.
●021632●夏天的太阳，照在我的右脸颊上，感觉很热。

○021633○The light that was reflected off the ground and the heated air itself swirled about me, heating my whole damn body.
●021633●阳光被地面反射着，温暖着周围的空气，缠绕着我的全身。

○021634○I don't want to let all the consideration you've shown me be for nothing.
●021634●我并不想让你们的关心白白浪费。

○021635○On top of that, the temperature.
●021635●还有温度。

●021637●阳光被地面反射着，周围温暖的空气缠绕着我的全身。

○021638○And last, the smell.
●021638●最后是，气味。

○021639○It was a scent that permeated through my senses, overwhelming me with nostalgia.
●021639●鼻子的深处，有种怀念的感觉正在扩散。

○021640○A scent that engulfed me when I was a child.
●021640●从小时候就包围着我的味道。

○021641○It was―the smell of the sun.
●021641●那是——太阳的味道。

○021642○Something stirred in a corner of my mind.
●021642●脑袋的角落里，掠过了什么东西。

○021643○A dim, blurry, hazy image of a kind little girl's smiling face.
●021643●温柔少女的笑容，模糊而又朦胧。

○021758○Soon after, a stifling cloud of water vapor enveloped the vicinity.
●021758●很快，水蒸气就冒了起来。

○021759○The evaporating water mixed with the soil created an intensely summery odor.
●021759●气化之后的水，与泥土混合在一起，散发出了强烈的夏日气息。

●021760●松下

●021762●松下

○021764○I closed my eyes once more.
●021764●我再次闭上了眼睛。

○021765○I'd had them open that whole time without even realizing it.
●021765●注意到的时候，才发现自己正一直睁着眼睛。

○021766○Back when I first arrived in this world, I was bewildered by the fact that I could see.
●021766●我刚刚来到这个世界的时候，曾经对自己能够看见的事实感到困惑。

○021767○But over time, I got used to it.
●021767●但是，很快就习惯了。

○021768○And now, I took it completely for granted.
●021768●然后，就变得理所当然了。

○021769○I was happy to get my vision back.
●021769●恢复了视力，让我感觉很开心。

○021770○However natural my blindness was to me when I was alive, I knew what it was like to be able to see.
●021770●不管失明的感觉，在我活着的时候有多么自然，我都清楚，能看到是什么感觉。

○021771○My sight was vital during the Battlefront's battles.
●021771●在战线的战斗中，视力也是必要的。

○021772○I thought that I never wanted to return to that darkness again.
●021772●我觉得自己已经对黑暗产生厌恶了。

○021773○However, this dimness itself was the world that I lived in.
●021773●但是，这种昏暗，正是我生活过的世界。

○021774○Had I forgotten that this whole time, without even realizing it?
●021774●我是不是，在不知不觉中忘记了呢？

○021775○With the smell of the soil, I remembered.
●021775●伴随着泥土的气味，我想起来了。

○021776○The world, back when I lost my vision.
●021776●眼睛看不见的，那时的世界。

○021777○The world I saw through sound, smell, and touch alone.
●021777●只靠声音、气味和触感，看到全部的世界。

○021778○se_breeze_loop
●021778●se_breeze_loop

○021779○I could sense it.
●021779●我能感觉到。

○021780○Mingling with the smell of summer, the gentle scent of a young girl's hair.
●021780●混杂着夏日的香气的，少女的头发的柔和气味。

○021781○...It felt like I just needed one more push; that with one more step, I would reach it.
●021781●…感觉再推一把，再走一步就能到达了。

○021782○I would reach her smile.
●021782●到达那张笑脸。

○021783○This path that Otonashi and the others opened up for me, the direction they chose―it wasn't mistaken at all.
●021783●音无他们为我打开的道路，在方向上并没有错。

○021784○I wanted to remember that sunflower girl and her smile.
●021784●我想要想起，那位向日葵少女的笑容。

○022009○"...Honestly, I'm not sure either. That already failed once before..."

○022010○That's right.
●022010●是的。

○022011○It didn't go well last time, certainly.
●022011●当时的确进展不顺。

○022012○But, that was my fault.
●022012●但，那是我的错。

○022013○Back then, I hadn't looked myself in the eyes.
●022013●那时的我，并没有直视自己。

○022014○Of course I'd be grossed out by my own made-up face.
●022014●肯定会对自己化了妆的脸感到恶心。

○022015○Even Shiina, who had proposed the idea, probably hadn't been totally serious about it.
●022015●就算是作为提案人的椎名，也没有认真对待吧。

○022016○The two of us, and Otonashi as well, were half-joking about the whole thing.
●022016●我和音无他们，都带着半开玩笑的心情。

○022017○And so, I hadn't even tried to properly look my reflection in the eye.
●022017●所以，我连镜子里的自己，都没有予以直视。

○022018○I glanced, sure, but back then I'd been grimacing.
●022018●确实看了一眼，但当时一直在愁眉苦脸的。

○022019○Shiina
●022019●椎名

○022020○"It's done."
●022020●「完成了哦」

○022021○Yui
●022021●由依

●022022●「前辈…你的眼睛…」

○022023○I couldn't blame Yui for sounding like that.
●022023●由依发出这种声音，也是没办法的吧。

○022024○However, this had to be the last push I needed.
●022024●但是，这应该是我所需要的最后一推。

○022025○Matsushita
●022025●松下

○022026○"The mirror!"
●022026●「镜子！」

○022027○Matsushita
●022027●松下

○022028○"The mirror!"
●022028●「镜子！」

○022029○I snatched the handheld mirror that Shiina offered me, and gazed into it.
●022029●我从椎名递过来的手里抢过了小镜子，盯着镜面看着。

○022030○Within, I saw my face, a face that couldn't be described as pretty under any circumstances, with makeup applied to my eyes. 
●022030●镜子里面，是我那张给眼睛化了妆的，就算再怎么恭维也说不上漂亮的脸。

○022031○I'm sure it looked silly.
●022031●肯定很奇怪吧。

○022032○But this time, I didn't sneer.
●022032●但是，我没有嗤笑。

○022033○I had to smile.
●022033●笑着就好。

○022034○After all, I was certain that Hinako-san was always smiling.
●022034●因为，阳菜子桑，一直都在笑着。

○022035○I thought back to those days so very long ago that I spent with her, and the days I spent in this world, as well.
●022035●我回想着往昔，和阳菜子桑度过的每一天，以及在这个世界上度过的每一天。

○022036○I felt nothing but gratitude towards Otonashi, Tachibana and the others, who had worked so hard for my sake.
●022036●对为了我而竭尽全力的音无和立华他们，我所怀有的，只有感激之情。

○022037○I felt nothing but gratitude towards Otonashi, Tachibana and the others, who had worked so hard for my sake.
●022037●对为了我而竭尽全力的音无和立华他们，我所怀有的，只有感激。

○022038○And with that thought―I naturally cracked a smile.
●022038●这样想着的我——自然地，露出了笑容。

○022039○Holding the mirror in my hand, I stared at the eyes that Hina-nee-chan told me resembled her own.
●022039●我用左手拿着镜子，盯着那双被阳菜姐点评过的，说是和她很像的眼睛。

○022060○The day after the tournament, I wasn't able to tell Hinako-san about my victory.
●022060●那场比赛的第二天，我没能把胜果报告给阳菜子桑。

○022061○Before I had the chance, she got caught up in an accident and departed from the world.
●022061●在我报告之前，她就遭遇了事故，然后离开了世界。

○022062○―I see, now. This must be what I always wanted to tell her.
●022062●——是吗，我想告诉她的是这个吗。

○022063○I wanted to remember her face, and then boast to her about my victory.
●022063●我想要记起她的脸，然后向她夸耀自己的胜利。

○022064○I wanted to declare that it was all thanks to her that I'd become so strong.
●022064●我想对她说，多亏了阳菜姐，自己才能变得如此强大。

●022086●一个化了妆的大男人，正在对着镜子哭泣。

○022087○Seen from an outside perspective, I'm sure it would have looked like some kind of preposterous farce.
●022087●这副样子在别人看来，一定相当滑稽吧。

○022088○However, none of us could possibly make fun of him.
●022088●但是，谁也没有取笑他。

○022089○Godan wiped away his tears with his sleeve, removing the makeup in the process.

●022090●nothing

●022093●nothing

○022738○"...Yeah."

○022739○In other words, that means that next summer, Kanade and I will still be around in this world.

○022740○The road ahead of us was still a long one.
●022740●我们的道路，还很漫长。

○022741○Just as Godan said, I was still weak.
●022741●正如护騨所说，我的力量还很弱。

○022742○I was well aware of that, and I felt a need to live up to his hopes for me...
●022742●我对这一点有自知之明，而且我也想要回报他的心意…。

○022782○"When we're lost, let's turn our faces to the sun."
●022782●「迷茫的时候，就望向太阳吧」

○022783○As she spoke, Kanade stopped watering the flowers for a moment and turned her gaze to the sky.
●022783●奏这么说着，停下了正在浇水的手，将目光转向了天空。

○022784○Dotted with big, billowing clouds and deeply, vividly blue: the summer sky.
●022784●积雨云涌动着的，色彩浓郁而鲜艳的，夏日的天空。

○022785○I looked up as well.
●022785●我也望向了天空。

○022786○I didn't know her name or her face, and yet somehow, for just a moment, it felt like I could see a young woman up there, smiling brilliantly down upon us.
●022786●那一瞬间，仿佛有一位不知道名字，不知道长相的年长少女，她的笑容浮现了出来。
